anya-e0103n7:2_2: ‘‘Anu anu sati anussatī’’ti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘punappunaṁ uppajjanato’’ti vatvā na ettha anu-saddayogena sati-saddo atthantaravācakoti dassetuṁ ‘‘satiyeva anussatī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:2_4: nāpi ‘‘sañjānanaṁ pajānana’’ntiādīsu saṁ-saddādayo viya atthantaradīpakoti dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:2_5: ‘‘Pavattitabbaṭṭhānamhiyeva vā pavattattā’’ti iminā ca anussatiyā anussaritabbānurūpatā vuttā hotīti pavattakasseva anurūpataṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘kulaputtassa anurūpā’’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:2_7: Anurūpatā nāma pavattitabbaṭṭhānassa anurūpatāya eva hotīti pavattakasseva anurūpatā vuttā, na ubhayassa. Anurūpāti ca yuttāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:2_8: Buddhanti ye guṇe upādāya bhagavati ‘‘buddho’’ti paññatti,
anya-e0103n7:2_12: Nanu ca nibbānaṁ visuṁ kammaṭṭhānabhāvena vakkhati? Kiñcāpi vakkhati,
anya-e0103n7:2_13: dhammabhāvasāmaññena pana maggaphalehi saddhiṁ idha pāḷiyā saṅgahitattā tassāpi dhammānussatikammaṭṭhāne gahaṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:2_14: asaṅkhatāmatādibhāvena pana maggaphalehi visiṭṭhatāya tassa visuṁ kammaṭṭhānabhāvena gahaṇaṁ kataṁ.
anya-e0103n7:2_15: Sīlānussatiādīnaṁ pana tissannaṁ anussatīnaṁ visuṁ kammaṭṭhānabhāvena gahaṇaṁ yogāvacarassa attano eva sīlassa cāgassa saddhādīnañca anussatiṭṭhānabhāvena gahetabbattā.
anya-e0103n7:2_16: Rūpakāyaṁ gatāti attano karajakāyaṁ ārabbha ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattā. Kāyeti kāye visayabhūte.
anya-e0103n7:2_18: Ito purimāsu sattasu anussatīsu natthi nimittuppatti ,
anya-e0103n7:3_1: Avecca buddhaguṇe yāthāvato ñatvā uppanno pasādo aveccappasādo, ariyamaggena āgatappasādo,
anya-e0103n7:3_2: taṁsadisopi vā yo diṭṭhigatavātehi acalo asampakampiyo, tena samannāgatena.
anya-e0103n7:3_4: Patirūpasenāsaneti yathāvuttaaṭṭhārasadosavajjite pañcaṅgasamannāgate senāsane. Rahogatenāti rahasi gatena. Tena kāyavivekaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:3_6: bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato paṭikkamāpetvā kammaṭṭhāne sallīnena, susiliṭṭhacittenāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:4_0: So bhagavāti ettha soti yo so samatiṁsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho devānaṁ atidevo brahmānaṁ atibrahmā lokanātho bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi sadevake loke ‘‘bhagavā’’ti patthaṭakittisaddo, so.
anya-e0103n7:4_2: Tathā hi vuttaṁ ‘‘bhagavāti netaṁ nāmaṁ mātarā kata’’ntiādi (mahāni. 198, 210; cūḷani. ajitamāṇavapucchāniddesa 2).
anya-e0103n7:4_4: Arahantiādīsu navasu ṭhānesu paccekaṁ itipi-saddaṁ yojetvā buddhaguṇā anussaritabbāti dassento ‘‘itipi arahaṁ…pe… itipi bhagavāti anussaratī’’ti āha.
anya-e0103n7:4_6: 1.6) viya iti-saddo āsannapaccakkhakaraṇattho, pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena nesaṁ bahubhāvo dīpito,
anya-e0103n7:4_7: tāni ca guṇasallakkhaṇakāraṇāni bhāventena cittassa sammukhībhūtāni kātabbānīti dassento ‘‘iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṁ hotī’’ti āha.
anya-e0103n7:5_1: Dūratā nāma āsannatā viya upādāyupādāya vuccatīti paramukkaṁsagataṁ dūrabhāvaṁ dassento ‘‘suvidūravidūre’’ti āha,
anya-e0103n7:5_3: Sā panassa kilesato dūratā tesaṁ sabbaso pahīnattāti dassento āha ‘‘maggena kilesānaṁ viddhaṁsitattā’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:5_4: Nanu aññesampi khīṇāsavānaṁ te pahīnā evāti anuyogaṁ manasi katvā vuttaṁ ‘‘savāsanāna’’nti.
anya-e0103n7:5_5: Na hi bhagavantaṁ ṭhapetvā aññe saha vāsanāya kilese pahātuṁ sakkonti ,
anya-e0103n7:5_6: etena aññehi asādhāraṇaṁ bhagavato arahattanti dassitaṁ hoti. Kā panāyaṁ vāsanā nāma?
anya-e0103n7:5_7: Pahīnakilesassāpi appahīnakilesassa payogasadisapayogahetubhūto kilesanihito sāmatthiyaviseso āyasmato pilindavacchassa (pārā.
anya-e0103n7:5_14: Ārakāti cettha ā-kārassa rassattaṁ, ka-kārassa ca ha-kāraṁ,
anya-e0103n7:5_16: Vuttamevatthaṁ sukhaggahaṇatthaṁ ‘‘so tato ārakā nāmā’’ti gāthābandhamāha.
anya-e0103n7:7_3: bahi ca samavaṭṭhitaṁ avijjābhavataṇhāmayaṁ dvayanti vuttaṁ ‘‘avijjābhavataṇhāmayanābhī’’ti. Nābhiyā,
anya-e0103n7:7_4: nemiyā ca sambandhā arasadisā paccayaphalabhūtehi avijjātaṇhājarāmaraṇehi sambandhā puññādisaṅkhārāti vuttaṁ ‘‘puññādiabhisaṅkhārāra’’nti.
anya-e0103n7:7_5: Tattha tattha bhave pariyantabhāvena pākaṭaṁ jarāmaraṇanti taṁ nemiṭṭhāniyaṁ katvā āha ‘‘jarāmaraṇanemī’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:7_7: evaṁ saṁsāracakkapavattiyā āsavasamudayoti āha ‘‘āsavasamudayamayena akkhena vijjhitvā’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:7_10: Vipākakaṭattārūpappabhedo kāmabhavādiko tibhavo eva ratho, tasmiṁ tibhavarathe. Attano paccayehi samaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:7_11: sabbaso vā ādito paṭṭhāya yojitanti samāyojitaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:9_0: Abbocchinnaṁ vattamānā, ‘saṁsāro’ti pavuccatī’’ti. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.95 apasādanāvaṇṇanā; saṁ. ni. aṭṭha. 2.2.60; a. ni. aṭṭha. 2.4.199) –
anya-e0103n7:10_1: Bodhimaṇḍeti bodhisaṅkhātassa ñāṇassa maṇḍabhāvappatte ṭhāne, kāle vā.
anya-e0103n7:10_2: Vīriyapādehīti saṁkilesavodānapakkhiyesu sannirumbhanasannikkhipanakiccatāya dvidhā pavattehi attano vīriyasaṅkhātehi pādehi.
anya-e0103n7:10_6: Kammakkhayakaranti kāyakammādibhedassa sabbassapi kammassa khayakaraṇato kammakkhayakaraṁ.
anya-e0103n7:11_1: Evaṁ ‘‘arānaṁ hatattā’’ti ettha vuttaaraghāte saṁsāraṁ cakkaṁ viya cakkanti gahetvā atthayojanaṁ katvā idāni paṭiccasamuppādadesanākkamenapi taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘atha vā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:11_2: Tattha anamataggaṁ saṁsāravaṭṭanti anu anu amataggaṁ aviññātakoṭikaṁ saṁsāramaṇḍalaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:11_3: Sesā dasa dhammā saṅkhārādayo jātipariyosānā arā. Kathaṁ? Nābhiyā avijjāya mūlato,
anya-e0103n7:11_4: nemiyā jarāmaraṇena antato sambandhattāti dassento āha ‘‘avijjāmūlakattā jarāmaraṇapariyantattā cā’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:11_6: Tattha dukkhe aññāṇaṁ tadantogadhattā, tappaṭicchādanato ca, sesesu paṭicchādanatova.
anya-e0103n7:11_7: Dukkhanti cettha dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ adhippetanti taṁ kāmabhavādivasena tidhā bhinditvā tathā tappaṭicchādikaṁ avijjaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:11_8: avijjādipaccaye tīsu bhavesu saṅkhārādike ca paṭipāṭiyā dassento ‘‘kāmabhave ca avijjā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:11_9: Tattha kāmabhave avijjāti kāmabhave ādīnavappaṭicchādikā avijjā.
anya-e0103n7:11_10: Rūpabhave arūpabhave avijjāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n7:11_14: Paccayo hotīti puññābhisaṅkhārānaṁ tāva ārammaṇapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena cāti dvidhā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0103n7:11_17: nānantarassa pana ārammaṇavasena ceva upanissayavasena ca paccayo hoti.
anya-e0103n7:11_20: Imasmiṁ panatthe ettha vitthāriyamāne atippapañco hoti,
anya-e0103n7:11_21: sayameva ca parato āgamissatīti na naṁ vitthārayāma.
anya-e0103n7:12_3: Tattha tattha sā sā taṇhāti rūpataṇhādibhedā tattha tattha kāmabhavādīsu uppajjanakā taṇhā.
anya-e0103n7:13_1: upādānabhave ca vibhajitvā vitthāretvā dassetuṁ ‘‘katha’’ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:13_4: Sā pana taṇhā yasmā bhusamādānavasena pavattamānā kāmupādānaṁ nāma hoti,
anya-e0103n7:14_2: ajitamāṇavapucchāniddesa 8 thoka visadisaṁ) vacanato bhavarāgopi kāmupādānamevāti katvā ‘‘kāmupādānapaccayā eva mettaṁ bhāvetī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:14_3: Sesupādānamūlikāsupīti etthāyaṁ yojanā – idhekacco ‘‘natthi paro loko’’ti natthikadiṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0103n7:14_4: so diṭṭhupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṁ caratītiādi vuttanayena yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:14_5: Aparo ‘‘asukasmiṁ sampattibhave attā ucchijjatī’’ti ucchedadiṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0103n7:14_6: so tatrūpapattiyā kāyena sucaritaṁ caratītiādi vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:14_7: Aparo ‘‘rūpī manomayo hutvā attā ucchijjatī’’ti rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti.
anya-e0103n7:14_9: Aparo ‘‘arūpabhave uppajjitvā attā ucchijjatī’’ti arūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti.
anya-e0103n7:14_13: Aparo ‘‘sīlena suddhī’’ti ‘‘asuddhimaggaṁ suddhimaggo’’ti parāmasanto sīlabbatupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṁ caratītiādinā sabbaṁ vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:15_0: Idāni yvāyaṁ saṁsāracakkaṁ dassentena ‘‘kāmabhave avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṁ paccayo hotī’’tiādinā avijjādīnaṁ paccayabhāvo,
anya-e0103n7:15_2: tameva paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṁ ānetvā nigamanavasena dassento ‘‘evaṁ aya’’ntiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:15_4: evaṁ avijjāpi kāmāsavādinā sahetukā evāti āha ‘‘ubhopete hetusamuppannā’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:15_5: Paccayapariggaheti nāmarūpassa paccayānaṁ avijjādīnaṁ paricchijja gahaṇe, nipphādetabbe bhummaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:15_8: Idañca dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṁ yasmā addhāttaye kaṅkhāmalavitaraṇavasena pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:15_10: Eteneva nayenāti etena ‘‘avijjā hetū’’tiādinā avijjāyaṁ vuttena nayena. ‘‘Saṅkhārā hetu,
anya-e0103n7:16_0: Saṁkhippanti ettha avijjādayo, viññāṇādayo cāti saṅkhepo, hetu, vipāko ca.
anya-e0103n7:16_1: Hetu vipākoti vā saṁkhippatīti saṅkhepo, avijjādayo viññāṇādayo ca.
anya-e0103n7:16_2: Saṅkhepabhāvasāmaññena pana ekavacanaṁ katanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Te pana saṅkhepā atīte hetu, etarahi vipāko, etarahi hetu,
anya-e0103n7:16_3: āyatiṁ vipākoti evaṁ kālavibhāgena cattāro jātā.
anya-e0103n7:16_5: Saṅkhepa-saddo vā bhāgādhivacananti atīto hetubhāgo paṭhamo saṅkhepo. Esa nayo sesesupi.
anya-e0103n7:16_8: Kammaṁ taṇhā ca tassa sahakārīkāraṇaṁ hutvā vaṭṭanatthena kammavaṭṭaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:17_0: Viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanānaṁ jātijarābhaṅgāvatthā ‘‘jātijarāmaraṇa’’nti vuttāti āha ‘‘jātijarāmaraṇāpadesenaviññāṇādīnaṁniddiṭṭhattā’’ti. Imeti viññāṇādayo.
anya-e0103n7:17_1: Āyatiṁ vipākavaṭṭaṁ paccuppannahetuto bhāvīnaṁ anāgatānaṁ gahitattā. Teti avijjādayo.
anya-e0103n7:17_2: Ākāratoti sarūpato avuttāpi tasmiṁ tasmiṁ saṅgahe ākirīyanti avijjāsaṅkhārādiggahaṇehi pakāsīyantīti ākārā,
anya-e0103n7:17_3: atītahetuādīnaṁ vā pakārā ākārā, tato ākārato.
anya-e0103n7:18_0: Saṅkhāraviññāṇānaṁ antarā eko sandhīti hetuto phalassa avicchedappavattibhāvato hetuphalasambandhabhūto eko sandhi. Tathā bhavajātīnamantarā.
anya-e0103n7:18_1: Vedanātaṇhānamantarā pana phalato hetuno avicchedappavattibhāvato phalahetusambandhabhūto eko sandhi.
anya-e0103n7:18_2: Phalabhūtopi hi dhammo aññassa hetusabhāvassa dhammassa paccayo hotīti.
anya-e0103n7:19_3: anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānādīsu ca āgatehi sabbehi ākārehi. Jānātīti avabujjhati.
anya-e0103n7:19_5: Aññāti paṭivijjhatīti tesaṁyeva vevacanaṁ. Tanti taṁ jānanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:20_2: Tattha te dhammeti te avijjādike dhamme.
anya-e0103n7:20_4: Nibbindanto balavavipassanāya virajjanto vimuccanto ariyamaggehi are hanīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n7:20_5: Tattha yadā bhagavā virajjati vimuccati, tadā are hanati nāma.
anya-e0103n7:20_6: Tato paraṁ pana abhisambuddhakkhaṇaṁ gahetvā vuttaṁ ‘‘hani vihani viddhaṁsesī’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:21_1: Cakkavattino acetane cakkaratane uppanne tattheva loko pūjaṁ karoti,
anya-e0103n7:21_3: kimaṅgaṁ pana sammāsambuddhe uppanneti dassento ‘‘uppanne tathāgate’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:21_4: Ko pana vādo aññesaṁ pūjāvisesānanti yathāvuttato aññesaṁ amahesakkhehi devamanussehi kariyamānānaṁ nātiuḷārānaṁ pūjāvisesānaṁ arahabhāve kā nāma kathā.
anya-e0103n7:22_1: Raho pāpaṁ karonti ‘‘mā naṁ koci jaññā’’ti esa bhagavā na kadāci karoti pāpahetūnaṁ bodhimaṇḍe eva suppahīnattā. Aparo nayo – ārakāti arahaṁ, suvidūrabhāvatoicceva attho. Kuto pana suvidūrabhāvatoti?
anya-e0103n7:22_3: tato eva appahīnarāgadosamohā ariyadhammassa akovidā ariyadhamme avinītā ariyadhammassa adassāvino appaṭipannā micchāpaṭipannā ca, tato suvidūrabhāvato. Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā –
anya-e0103n7:23_1: bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa pāde pādaṁ nikkhipanto,
anya-e0103n7:23_2: so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo. Atha kho so ārakāva mayhaṁ, ahañca tassa. Taṁ kissa hetu? Dhammaṁ hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na passati,
anya-e0103n7:24_0: Yathāvuttapuggalā hi sacepi sāyaṁ pātaṁ satthu santikāvacarāva siyuṁ,
anya-e0103n7:24_1: na te tāvatā ‘‘satthu santikā’’ti vattabbā, tathā satthāpi nesaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:26_0: Ārakā tehi bhagavā, dūre tenārahaṁ mato’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:27_0: Tathā ārakāti arahaṁ, āsannabhāvatoti attho. Kuto pana āsannabhāvatoti?
anya-e0103n7:27_2: tato eva pahīnarāgadosamohā ariyadhammassa kovidā ariyadhamme suvinītā ariyadhammassa dassāvino sammāpaṭipannā, tato āsannabhāvato. Vuttampi cetaṁ bhagavatā –
anya-e0103n7:28_1: so ca hoti anabhijjhālu kāmesu na tibbasārāgo abyāpannacitto appaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto saṁvutindriyo.
anya-e0103n7:28_2: Atha kho so santikeva mayhaṁ, ahañca tassa. Taṁ kissa hetu? Dhammaṁ hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu passati,
anya-e0103n7:29_0: Tathārūpā hi puggalā satthu yojanasahassantarikāpi honti,
anya-e0103n7:29_1: na tāvatā te ‘‘satthu dūracārino’’ti vattabbā, tathā satthāpi nesaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:31_0: Ārakā tehi āsanne, tenāpi arahaṁ jino.
anya-e0103n7:32_0: Ye ime rāgādayo pāpadhammā yasmiṁ santāne uppajjanti,
anya-e0103n7:32_2: Nibbānagāminiyā paṭipadāya ekaṁseneva ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā ca, te attahitaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:32_3: parahitañca paripūretuṁ sammā paṭipajjantehi sādhūhi dūrato rahitabbā pariccajitabbā pahātabbāti rahā nāma,
anya-e0103n7:32_4: te ca yasmā bhagavato bodhimūleyeva ariyamaggena sabbaso pahīnā samucchinnā. Yathāha –
anya-e0103n7:33_0: ‘‘Tathāgatassa kho, brāhmaṇa, rāgo pahīno doso moho,
anya-e0103n7:33_1: sabbepi pāpakā akusalā dhammā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṁkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā’’ti (pārā. 9-10 atthato samānaṁ).
anya-e0103n7:34_0: Tasmā sabbaso na santi etassa rahāti arahoti vattabbe okārassa sānusāraṁ a-kārādesaṁ katvā ‘‘araha’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:36_0: Tesaṁ suṭṭhu pahīnattā, bhagavā arahaṁ mato.
anya-e0103n7:37_0: Ye te sabbaso pariññātakkhandhā pahīnakilesā bhāvitamaggā sacchikatanirodhā arahanto khīṇāsavā,
anya-e0103n7:37_1: ye ca sekkhā appattamānasā anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ patthayamānā viharanti,
anya-e0103n7:37_2: ye ca parisuddhapayogā kalyāṇajjhāsayā saddhāsīlasutādiguṇasampannā puggalā,
anya-e0103n7:37_3: tehi na rahitabbo na pariccajitabbo, te ca bhagavatāti arahaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:37_4: Tathā hi ariyapuggalā satthārā diṭṭhadhammassa paccakkhakaraṇato satthu dhammasarīrena avirahitā eva honti. Yathāha āyasmā piṅgiyo –
anya-e0103n7:42_0: ‘‘Saddhā ca pīti ca mano sati ca,
anya-e0103n7:46_0: Teneva ca te aññaṁ satthāraṁ na uddisanti. Yathāha –
anya-e0103n7:47_1: yaṁ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddiseyyāti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī’’ti (ma. ni. 3.128; a. ni. 1.276).
anya-e0103n7:48_0: Kalyāṇaputhujjanāpi yebhuyyena satthari niccalasaddhā eva honti.
anya-e0103n7:48_2: tesañca avirahanato na santi etassa rahā pariccajanakā,
anya-e0103n7:48_3: natthi vā etassa raho sādhūhi pariccajitabbatāti arahaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:50_0: Na tehi rahito hoti, nātho tenārahaṁ mato’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:51_1: bhagavato ca nānāgatīsu paribbhamanasaṅkhātaṁ saṁsāre gamanaṁ natthi kammakkhayakarena ariyamaggena bodhimūleyeva sabbaso sasambhārassa kammavaṭṭassa viddhaṁsitattā. Yathāha –
anya-e0103n7:54_0: Te mayhaṁ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā’’ti. (a. ni. 4.36);
anya-e0103n7:55_0: Evaṁ natthi etassa rahogamanaṁ gatīsu paccājātītipi arahaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:56_0: Raho vā gamanaṁ yassa, saṁsāre natthi sabbaso;
anya-e0103n7:58_2: Pāsaṁsabhāvo ca bhagavato anaññasādhāraṇo yathābhuccaguṇādhigato sadevake loke suppatiṭṭhito.
anya-e0103n7:58_3: Tathā hesa anuttarena sīlena anuttarena samādhinā anuttarāya paññāya anuttarāya vimuttiyā asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggaloti evaṁ tasmiṁ tasmiṁ guṇe vibhajitvā vuccamāne paṇḍitapurisehi devehi brahmehi bhagavatā vā pana pariyosāpetuṁ asakkuṇeyyarūpo.
anya-e0103n7:59_0: Guṇehi sadiso natthi, yasmā loke sadevake;
anya-e0103n7:64_0: Bhavesu ca rahābhāvā, pāsaṁsā arahaṁ jino’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:65_1: Sambuddhoti hi ettha saṁ-saddo ‘‘saya’’nti etassa atthassa bodhako daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n7:65_3: Kathaṁ panettha sabbadhammāvabodho labbhatīti? Ekadesassa aggahaṇato.
anya-e0103n7:65_4: Padesaggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatāva viññāyati yathā ‘‘dikkhito na dadātī’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:65_5: Evañca katvā atthavisesānapekkhā kattari eva buddhasaddasiddhi veditabbā kammavacanicchāya abhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:65_6: ‘‘Sammā sāmaṁ buddhattā sammāsambuddho’’ti ettakameva hi idha saddato labbhati,
anya-e0103n7:66_0: Idāni tassā visayaṁ ‘‘sabbadhamme’’ti sāmaññato vuttaṁ vibhajitvā dassetuṁ ‘‘abhiññeyye dhamme’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:66_1: Tattha abhiññeyyeti abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena jānitabbe. Ke pana teti? Catusaccadhamme.
anya-e0103n7:66_2: Abhiññeyyato buddhoti abhiññeyyabhāvato bujjhi. Pubbabhāge vipassanāpaññāya, adhigamakkhaṇe maggapaññāya,
anya-e0103n7:66_3: aparabhāge sabbaññutaññāṇādīhi aññāsīti attho. Ito paresupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n7:66_4: Pariññeyye dhammeti dukkhaṁ ariyasaccamāha. Pahātabbeti samudayapakkhiye.
anya-e0103n7:66_6: Bahuvacananiddeso pana sopādisesādikaṁ pariyāyasiddhaṁ bhedaṁ gahetvā kato,
anya-e0103n7:66_9: Uddeso ca avinicchitatthaparicchedassa dhammassa vasena karīyati.
anya-e0103n7:66_10: Uddesena hi uddisiyamānānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthitāmattaṁ vuccati,
anya-e0103n7:66_11: na paricchedoti aparicchedena bahuvacanena vuttaṁ yathā ‘‘appaccayā dhammā, asaṅkhatā dhammā’’ti (dha. sa. dukamātikā 7-8).
anya-e0103n7:66_14: Evañca bhāvetabbeti ettha jhānānampi gahaṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:67_2: Tasmā buddhosmīti yasmā cattāri saccāni mayā buddhāni,
anya-e0103n7:67_4: tasmā sabbampi ñeyyaṁ buddhosmi, abbhaññāsinti attho.
anya-e0103n7:68_1: Evaṁ saccavasena sāmaññato vuttamatthaṁ dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṁ dvārappavattadhammehi,
anya-e0103n7:68_2: khandhādīhi ca saccavaseneva vibhajitvā dassetuṁ ‘‘api cā’’tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:68_3: Tattha mūlakāraṇabhāvenāti santesupi avijjādīsu aññesu kāraṇesu tesampi mūlabhūtakāraṇabhāvena.
anya-e0103n7:68_5: sahāyabhāvūpagamanato ca dukkhavicittatāya padhānakāraṇaṁ. Samuṭṭhāpikāti uppādikā.
anya-e0103n7:68_6: Purimataṇhāti purimabhavasiddhā taṇhā. Ubhinnanti cakkhussa , taṁsamudayassa ca.
anya-e0103n7:68_11: upādānakkhandhantogadhattā ca dukkhasaccasaṅgahaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘rūpataṇhādayo cha taṇhākāyā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:69_2: Nava bhavāti kāmabhavādayo tayo, saññībhavādayo tayo,
anya-e0103n7:69_6: Ettha ca kusaladhammānaṁ upanissayabhūtā taṇhā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhāti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n7:69_7: Kiriyadhammānaṁ pana yattha te tassa attabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtā.
anya-e0103n7:70_0: Anubuddhoti bujjhitabbadhammassa anurūpato buddho. Tenāti tasmā. Yasmā sāmaññato,
anya-e0103n7:70_1: visesato ca ekekapaduddhārena sabbadhamme buddho, tasmā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:70_3: sabbassapi ñeyyassa sabbākārato aviparītaṁ sayameva abhisambuddhattāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:70_4: Imināssa paropadesarahitassa sabbākārena sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthassa ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhavuttino anāvaraṇañāṇasaṅkhātassa sabbaññutaññāṇassa adhigamo dassito.
anya-e0103n7:71_3: visayapavattibhedavasena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṁ ekasseva ñāṇassa dvidhā vuttattā.
anya-e0103n7:71_6: Yathāha paṭisambhidāyaṁ ‘‘sabbaṁ saṅkhatamasaṅkhataṁ anavasesaṁ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:71_12: Na hi bhagavato ñāṇassa aṇumattampi āvaraṇaṁ atthi,
anya-e0103n7:71_13: anāvaraṇañāṇassa ca asabbadhammārammaṇabhāve yattha taṁ na pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:71_15: Atha vā pana hotu aññameva anāvaraṇañāṇaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇato,
anya-e0103n7:71_16: idha pana sabbattha appaṭihatavuttitāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti sabbaññutaññāṇameva adhippetaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:71_18: sammāsambuddho’’ti ca vuccati na sakiṁyeva sabbadhammāvabodhato.
anya-e0103n7:71_20: 1.162) ‘‘vimokkhantikametaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ ‘‘buddho’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:71_21: Sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthañāṇasamadhigamena hi bhagavato santāne anavasesadhamme paṭivijjhituṁ samatthatā ahosīti.
anya-e0103n7:72_0: Etthāha – kiṁ panidaṁ ñāṇaṁ pavattamānaṁ sakiṁyeva sabbasmiṁ visaye pavattati, udāhu kamenāti?
anya-e0103n7:72_1: Kiñcettha – yadi tāva sakiṁyeva sabbasmiṁ visaye pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:72_3: asaṅkhatasammutidhammānañca ekajjhaṁ upaṭṭhāne dūrato cittapaṭaṁ pekkhantassa viya paṭivibhāgenāvabodho na siyā,
anya-e0103n7:72_4: tathā ca sati ‘‘sabbe dhammā anattā’’ti vipassantānaṁ anattākārena viya sabbadhammā anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇassa visayā hontīti āpajjati.
anya-e0103n7:72_5: Yepi ‘‘sabbañeyyadhammānaṁ ṭhitalakkhaṇavisayaṁ vikapparahitaṁ sabbakālaṁ buddhānaṁ ñāṇaṁ pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:72_8: tiṭṭhantopi samāhito’ti idampi vacanaṁ suvuttaṁ hotī’’ti vadanti, tesampi vuttadosānātivatti,
anya-e0103n7:72_9: ṭhitalakkhaṇārammaṇatāya ca atītānāgatasammutidhammānaṁ tadabhāvato ekadesavisayameva bhagavato ñāṇaṁ siyā.
anya-e0103n7:72_10: Tasmā sakiṁyeva ñāṇaṁ pavattatīti na yujjati.
anya-e0103n7:73_0: Atha kamena sabbasmiṁ visaye ñāṇaṁ pavattati? Evampi na yujjati.
anya-e0103n7:73_2: disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne ñeyye kamena gayhamāne tassa anavasesapaṭivedho sambhavati, apariyantabhāvato ñeyyassa.
anya-e0103n7:73_3: Ye pana ‘‘atthassa avisaṁvādanato ñeyyassa ekadesaṁ paccakkhaṁ katvā ‘sesepi eva’nti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanena sabbaññū bhagavā,
anya-e0103n7:73_5: Saṁsayānubaddhaṁ hi loke anumānañāṇa’’nti vadanti, tesampi taṁ na yuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:73_6: Sabbassa hi appaccakkhabhāve atthāvisaṁvādanena ñeyyassa ekadesaṁ paccakkhaṁ katvā ‘‘sesepi eva’’nti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanassa asambhavato. Yañhi taṁ sesaṁ, taṁ appaccakkhanti.
anya-e0103n7:74_1: tassa sesabhāvo eva na siyāti? Sabbametaṁ akāraṇaṁ. Kasmā ? Avisayavicāraṇabhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:74_2: Vuttaṁ hetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘buddhavisayo, bhikkhave, acinteyyo na cintetabbo. Yo cinteyya,
anya-e0103n7:74_4: Idaṁ panettha sanniṭṭhānaṁ – yaṁkiñci bhagavatā ñātuṁ icchitaṁ sakalaṁ, ekadeso vā,
anya-e0103n7:74_7: Ñātuṁ icchitassa ca sakalassa avisayabhāve tassa ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhavuttitā na siyā,
anya-e0103n7:74_8: ekanteneva sā icchitabbā ‘‘sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanappaṭibaddhā ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhā manasikārappaṭibaddhā cittuppādappaṭibaddhā’’ti vacanato.
anya-e0103n7:75_0: Nanu ca etasmiṁ pakkhe yadā sakalaṁ ñātuṁ icchitaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:75_1: tadā sakiṁyeva sakalavisayatāya anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṁ pavatteyyāti vuttadosānātivattiyevāti? Na, tassa visodhitattā.
anya-e0103n7:75_3: Aññathā pacurajanañāṇasamānavuttitāya buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ ñāṇassa acinteyyatā na siyā.
anya-e0103n7:75_4: Tasmā sakaladhammārammaṇampi taṁ ekadhammārammaṇaṁ viya suvavatthāpiteyeva te dhamme katvā pavattatīti idamettha acinteyyaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:75_5: Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘yāvatakaṁ ñeyyaṁ, tāvatakaṁ ñāṇaṁ. Yāvatakaṁ ñāṇaṁ, tāvatakaṁ ñeyyaṁ. Ñeyyapariyantikaṁ ñāṇaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:75_7: mogharājamāṇavapucchāniddesa 85; paṭi. ma. 3.5). Evamekajjhaṁ, visuṁ, sakiṁ,
anya-e0103n7:75_8: kamena vā icchānurūpaṁ sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṁ buddhattā sammāsambuddho.
anya-e0103n7:76_4: Tato eva attano visayassa viditakaraṇaṭṭhenapi vijjā.
anya-e0103n7:76_5: Sampannattāti samannāgatattā, paripuṇṇattā vā, avikalattāti attho. Tissannaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:76_6: aṭṭhannaṁ ca vijjānaṁ tattha tattha sutte gahaṇaṁ vineyyajjhāsayavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:76_7: Satta saddhammā nāma saddhā hirī ottappaṁ bāhusaccaṁ vīriyaṁ sati paññā ca.
anya-e0103n7:76_8: Ye sandhāya vuttaṁ ‘‘idha bhikkhu saddho hotī’’tiādi (a. ni. 10.11).
anya-e0103n7:76_9: Cattāri jhānānīti yāni kānici cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni.
anya-e0103n7:77_0: Kasmā panettha sīlādayo pannaraseva ‘‘caraṇa’’nti vuttāti codanaṁ sandhāyāha ‘‘imeyeva hī’’tiādi .
anya-e0103n7:77_1: Tena tesaṁ sikkhattayasaṅgahato nibbānupagamane ekaṁsato sādhanabhāvamāha.
anya-e0103n7:78_0: Nanu cāyaṁ vijjācaraṇasampadā sāvakesupi labbhatīti? Kiñcāpi labbhati, na pana tathā,
anya-e0103n7:78_3: so cettha mahaggatabhāvappattā sādhāraṇabhāvoti āha ‘‘caraṇasampadā mahākāruṇikataṁ pūretvā ṭhitā’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:78_4: Yathā sattānaṁ anatthaṁ parivajjetvā atthe niyojanaṁ paññāya vinā na hoti,
anya-e0103n7:78_5: evaṁ nesaṁ atthānatthajānanaṁ satthu karuṇāya vinā na hotīti ubhayampi ubhayattha sakiccakameva siyā.
anya-e0103n7:78_8: Tattha yathā taṁ vijjācaraṇasampannoti yathā aññopi vijjācaraṇasampanno,
anya-e0103n7:78_10: Sā panāyaṁ satthu vijjācaraṇasampadā sāsanassa niyyānikatāya sāvakānaṁ sammāpaṭipattiyā ekantakāraṇanti dassetuṁ ‘‘tenassā’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Taṁ suviññeyyameva.
anya-e0103n7:79_0: Ettha ca vijjāsampadāya satthu paññāmahattaṁ pakāsitaṁ hoti,
anya-e0103n7:79_2: Tesu paññāya bhagavato dhammarajjappatti, karuṇāya dhammasaṁvibhāgo.
anya-e0103n7:79_7: Paññāya parinibbānābhimukhabhāvo, karuṇāya tadadhigamo. Paññāya sayaṁ taraṇaṁ, karuṇāya paresaṁ tāraṇaṁ. Paññāya buddhabhāvasiddhi, karuṇāya buddhakiccasiddhi.
anya-e0103n7:79_8: Karuṇāya vā bodhisattabhūmiyaṁ saṁsārābhimukhabhāvo, paññāya tattha anabhirati.
anya-e0103n7:79_12: paññāya attānaṁ rakkhanto paraṁ rakkhati. Tathā karuṇāya aparantapo, paññāya anattantapo.
anya-e0103n7:79_13: Tena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu catutthapuggalabhāvo siddho hoti. Tathā karuṇāya lokanāthatā, paññāya attanāthatā. Karuṇāya cassa ninnatābhāvo, paññāya unnamābhāvo.
anya-e0103n7:79_14: Tathā karuṇāya sabbasattesu janitānuggaho paññānugatattā na ca na sabbattha virattacitto,
anya-e0103n7:79_15: paññāya sabbadhammesu virattacitto karuṇānugatattā na ca na sabbasattānuggahāya pavatto.
anya-e0103n7:79_17: evaṁ paññā ahaṁkāramamaṁkāravinimuttāti aññamaññavisodhitā paramavisuddhā guṇavisesā vijjācaraṇasampadāhi pakāsitāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:80_0: 134.Gamanampi hi gatanti vuccati ‘‘gate ṭhite’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.214; 2.376). Sobhananti subhaṁ. Subhabhāvo visuddhatāya,
anya-e0103n7:80_2: Gamanañca nāma bahuvidhanti idhādhippetaṁ gamanaṁ dassento ‘‘ariyamaggo’’ti āha.
anya-e0103n7:80_3: So hi nibbānassa gati adhigamoti katvā ‘‘gataṁ, gamana’’nti ca vuccati.
anya-e0103n7:80_4: Idāni tasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘tena hesā’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Khemaṁ disanti nibbānaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:80_5: Asajjamānoti paripanthābhāvena sugatigamanepi asajjanto saṅgaṁ akaronto, pageva itarattha.
anya-e0103n7:80_6: Atha vā ekāsane nisīditvā khippabhiññāvaseneva catunnampi maggānaṁ paṭiladdhabhāvato asajjamāno asajjanto gato.
anya-e0103n7:80_8: sabbañca anuttaraṁ sampattiṁ āvahati, tadeva sobhanaṁ nāma.
anya-e0103n7:80_9: Tena ca bhagavā gatoti āha ‘‘iti sobhanagamanattā sugato’’ti sobhanattho su-saddoti katvā.
anya-e0103n7:81_0: Asundarānaṁ dukkhānaṁ saṅkhārappavattīnaṁ abhāvato accantasukhattā ekantato sundaraṁ nāma asaṅkhatā dhātūti āha ‘‘sundarañcesa ṭhānaṁ gato amataṁ nibbāna’’nti.
anya-e0103n7:81_1: Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘nibbānaṁ paramaṁ sukha’’nti (ma. ni. 2.215; dha. pa. 203-204). Sammāti suṭṭhu.
anya-e0103n7:81_2: Suṭṭhu gamanañca nāma paṭipakkhena anabhibhūtassa gamananti āha ‘‘pahīne kilese puna apaccāgacchanto’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:81_5: sāpi sammāgamanamevāti evampi bhagavā sugatoti dassetuṁ ‘‘sammā vā gato’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:81_7: ‘‘Sabbalokassa hitasukhameva karonto’’ti etena mahābodhiyā paṭipadā avibhāgena sabbasattānaṁ sabbadā hitasukhāvahabhāveneva pavattatīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:81_8: ‘‘Sassataṁ ucchedanti ime ante anupagacchanto gato’’ti etena paṭiccasamuppādagatiṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:81_9: ‘‘Kāmasukhaṁ attakilamathanti ime anupagacchanto gato’’ti etena ariyamaggagatiṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:82_0: Tatrāti yuttaṭṭhāne yuttasseva bhāsane nipphādetabbe, sādhetabbe cetaṁ bhummaṁ. Abhūtanti abhūtatthaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:82_1: Atthamukhena hi vācāya abhūtatā, bhūtatā vā. Atacchanti tasseva vevacanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:82_5: samparāyikena vā anatthena sañhitaṁ, anatthāvahaṁ. Na atthoti anattho, atthassa paṭipakkho, abhāvo ca, tena sañhitaṁ, pisuṇavācaṁ, samphappalāpañcāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:82_11: Tatiyā nerayikādikassa nerayikādibhāvavibhāvanīkathā yathā ‘‘āpāyiko devadatto nerayiko’’tiādikā (cūḷava. 348).
anya-e0103n7:82_12: Catutthī ‘‘vedavihitena yaññavidhinā pāṇātipātādikataṁ sugatiṁ āvahatī’’ti lokassa byāmohanakathā.
anya-e0103n7:82_15: Evaṁ sammā gadattāti yathāvuttaṁ abhūtādiṁ vajjetvā bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ atthasañhitaṁ piyaṁ manāpaṁ tato eva sammā suṭṭhu gadanato sugato da-kārassa ta-kāraṁ katvā.
anya-e0103n7:82_16: Āpāthagamanamattena kassaci appiyampi hi bhagavato vacanaṁ piyaṁ manāpameva atthasiddhiyā lokassa hitasukhāvahattā.
anya-e0103n7:83_0: Apica sobhanaṁ gataṁ gamanaṁ etassāti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:83_1: Bhagavato hi veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṁ ekantena tesaṁ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṁ bhaddakaṁ .
anya-e0103n7:83_5: Atha vā sayambhūñāṇena sakalampi lokaṁ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto sammā gato avagatoti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:83_6: Tathā lokasamudayaṁ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṁ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:83_7: Lokanirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:83_8: Lokanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:83_9: Tathā yaṁ imassa sadevakassa lokassa diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ pariyesitaṁ anuvicaritaṁ manasā,
anya-e0103n7:83_10: sabbaṁ taṁ hatthatale āmalakaṁ viya sammā paccakkhato gato abbhaññāsīti sugato.
anya-e0103n7:84_1: Yo yo loko yathā yathā veditabbo, tathā tathā.
anya-e0103n7:84_3: Tattha sabhāvatoti dukkhasabhāvato. Sabbo hi loko dukkhasabhāvo.
anya-e0103n7:84_5: Samudayatoti yato so samudeti, tato taṇhādito.
anya-e0103n7:84_6: Nirodhatoti yattha so nirujjhati, tato visaṅkhārato.
anya-e0103n7:84_7: Nirodhūpāyatoti yena vidhinā so nirodho pattabbo, tato ariyamaggato, ito aññassa pakārassa abhāvā.
anya-e0103n7:85_0: Iti ‘‘sabbathā lokaṁ avedī’’ti vatvā tadatthasādhakaṁ suttaṁ dassento ‘‘yattha kho āvuso’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:85_1: Tattha ‘‘na jāyatī’’tiādinā ujukaṁ jātiādīni paṭikkhipitvā ‘‘na cavati na upapajjatī’’ti padadvayena aparāparaṁ cavanupapajjanāni paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0103n7:85_3: itaraṁ opapātikavasenā’’ti vadanti. Tanti jātiādirahitaṁ. Gamanenāti padasā gamanena. Ñāteyyanti jānitabbaṁ. ‘‘Ñātāya’’nti vā pāṭho,
anya-e0103n7:86_0: Kāmaṁ pādagamanena gantvā lokassantaṁ ñātuṁ, daṭṭhuṁ, pattuṁ vā na sakkā,
anya-e0103n7:86_1: apica parimitaparicchinnaṭṭhāne taṁ paññāpetvā dassemīti dassento ‘‘apicā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:86_4: Aviññāṇake pana utusamuṭṭhānarūpasamudāyamatte paññāpetuṁ na sakkāti adhippāyo. Lokanti khandhādilokaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:86_5: Lokanirodhanti tassa lokassa nirujjhanaṁ, nibbānameva vā.
anya-e0103n7:86_6: Adesampi hi taṁ yesaṁ nirodho, tesaṁ vasena upacārato,
anya-e0103n7:86_7: desatopi niddisīyati yathā ‘‘cakkhuṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:86_9: ettha nirujjhamānā nirujjhatī’’ti (dī. ni. 2.401; ma. ni. 1.134; vibha. 204).
anya-e0103n7:87_1: Lokassantoti saṅkhāralokassa anto antakiriyāhetubhūtaṁ nibbānaṁ. Kudācananti kadācipi.
anya-e0103n7:87_4: Tasmāti yasmā lokassantaṁ apatvā vaṭṭadukkhato mutti natthi, tasmā. Haveti nipātamattaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:87_5: Lokavidūti sabhāvādito sabbaṁ lokaṁ jānanto. Sumedhoti sundarapañño.
anya-e0103n7:87_6: Lokantagūti pariññābhisamayena lokaṁ viditvā pahānābhisamayena lokantagū.
anya-e0103n7:87_9: catusaccadhammānaṁ vā abhisamitattā samitāvī. Nāsīsati na pattheti. Yathā imaṁ lokaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:88_1: Evaṁ yadipi lokavidutā anavasesato dassitā sabhāvato dassitattā,
anya-e0103n7:88_2: loko pana ekadeseneva vuttoti taṁ anavasesato dassetuṁ ‘‘apica tayo lokā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:88_3: Tattha indriyabaddhānaṁ khandhānaṁ samūho, santāno ca sattaloko.
anya-e0103n7:88_5: lokīyanti ettha kusalākusalaṁ, tabbipāko cāti lokoti.
anya-e0103n7:88_7: santāno ca okāsaloko lokiyanti ettha tasā, thāvarā ca, tesañca okāsabhūtoti.
anya-e0103n7:88_9: Ubhayepi khandhā saṅkhāraloko paccayehi saṅkharīyanti, lujjanti palujjanti cāti.
anya-e0103n7:88_11: Paccayattho hettha āhāra-saddo ‘‘ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā’’tiādīsu (saṁ. ni. 5.232) viya.
anya-e0103n7:88_12: Evaṁ hi ‘‘sabbe sattā’’ti iminā asaññasattāpi pariggahitā honti.
anya-e0103n7:88_14: na sattadhammoti āha ‘‘āhāraṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:89_3: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno sammā pariyantadassāvī sammadatthaṁ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamasmiṁ ekadhamme?
anya-e0103n7:89_7: na saṅkhāravisayāti āha ‘‘sassato lokoti vā asassato lokoti vā āgataṭṭhāne sattaloko veditabbo’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:90_0: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantīti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā parivattanti paribbhamanti.
anya-e0103n7:90_1: Disā bhanti virocamānāti tesaṁ paribbhamaneneva tā disā pabhassarā hutvā virocanti.
anya-e0103n7:90_2: Tāva sahassadhā lokoti tattakaṁ sahassappakāro okāsaloko, sahassalokadhātuyoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:91_2: Eko lokoti ‘‘sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti yāya puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbesaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ paccayāyattavuttitā vuttā,
anya-e0103n7:91_3: tāya sabbo saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho pakārantarassa abhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:91_4: Dve lokātiādīsupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n7:91_5: Nāma-ggahaṇena cettha nibbānassa aggahaṇaṁ, tassa alokasabhāvattā.
anya-e0103n7:91_6: Nanu ca ‘‘āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphaladhammānampi lokatā āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati,
anya-e0103n7:91_8: Atha vā ‘‘na lujjati na palujjatī’’ti yo gahito tathā na hoti,
anya-e0103n7:91_9: so lokoti taṁgahaṇarahitānaṁ lokuttarānaṁ natthi lokatā.
anya-e0103n7:92_0: Ettha ca ‘‘āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti paccayāyattavuttitāvacanena saṅkhārānaṁ aniccatā. Tāya ca ‘‘yadaniccaṁ, taṁ dukkhaṁ. Yaṁ dukkhaṁ, tadanattā’’ti (saṁ. ni.
anya-e0103n7:92_1: 3.15) vacanato dukkhānattatā ca pakāsitā hontīti tīṇipi sāmaññalakkhaṇāni gahitāni.
anya-e0103n7:92_2: Nāmanti cattāro arūpino khandhā, te ca atthato phassādayo. Rūpanti bhūtupādāyarūpāni,
anya-e0103n7:92_3: tāni ca atthato pathavīādayoti aviseseneva salakkhaṇato saṅkhārā gahitā.
anya-e0103n7:92_4: Taggahaṇeneva ye tesaṁ visesā kusalādayo, hetuādayo ca,
anya-e0103n7:92_5: tepi gahitā eva hontīti āha ‘‘iti ayaṁ saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā vidito’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:93_0: Āgamma cittaṁ seti etthāti āsayo migāsayo viya.
anya-e0103n7:93_1: Yathā migo gocarāya gantvā paccāgantvā tattheva vanagahane sayatīti so tassa āsayo,
anya-e0103n7:93_2: evaṁ aññathā pavattitvāpi cittaṁ āgamma yattha seti, so tassa āsayoti vuccati.
anya-e0103n7:96_0: Tattha sabbadiṭṭhīnaṁ sassatucchedadiṭṭhīhi saṅgahitattā sabbepi diṭṭhigatikā sattā imā eva dve diṭṭhiyo sannissitā.
anya-e0103n7:96_3: Atthitāti hi sassataggāho adhippeto, natthitāti ucchedaggāho.
anya-e0103n7:97_0: Āsayaṁ jānātīti catubbidhampi sattānaṁ āsayaṁ jānāti.
anya-e0103n7:98_0: ‘‘Kāmaṁ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṁ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti,
anya-e0103n7:98_1: kāmaṁ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṁ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto’ti’’ādi (paṭi. ma. 1.113).
anya-e0103n7:99_0: Appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayantīti anusayā,
anya-e0103n7:99_3: Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanti. Ke pana te?
anya-e0103n7:99_6: Na hi dhammānaṁ kālabhedena sabhāvabhedo atthi.
anya-e0103n7:99_7: Taṁ sattavidhaṁ anusayaṁ tassa tassa sattassa santāne paroparabhāvena pavattamānaṁ jānāti.
anya-e0103n7:100_6: Taṁ caritaṁ sabhāvato saṁkilesavodānato samuṭṭhānato phalato nissandatoti evamādinā pakārena jānāti.
anya-e0103n7:101_5: Taṁ adhimuttiṁ jānāti ‘‘imassa adhimutti hīnā, imassa paṇītā’’ti, tatthāpi ‘‘imassa mudu, imassa mudutarā, imassa mudutamā’’tiādinā.
anya-e0103n7:101_6: Indriyānaṁ hi tikkhamudubhāvādinā yathārahaṁ adhimuttiyā tikkhamudubhāvādiko veditabbo.
anya-e0103n7:101_8: 820) ‘‘heṭṭhā gahitāpi adhimutti idha sattānaṁ tikkhindriyamudindriyabhāvadassanatthaṁ puna gahitā’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:102_1: appaṁ vā rajaṁ paññāmaye akkhimhi etesanti apparajakkhā, anussadarāgādirajā sattā, te apparajakkhe.
anya-e0103n7:103_4: Suviññāpayeti sammattaniyāmaṁ viññāpetuṁ sukare saddhe, paññavante ca.
anya-e0103n7:103_8: imassa dosarajo appo’’tiādinā apparajakkhesu jānanaṁ veditabbaṁ. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n7:103_9: Tasmāti yasmā bhagavā aparimāṇe satte āsayādito anavasesetvā jānāti,
anya-e0103n7:103_10: tasmā assa bhagavato sattalokopi sabbathā vidito.
anya-e0103n7:104_0: Nanu ca sattesu pamāṇādipi jānitabbo atthīti? Atthi.
anya-e0103n7:104_1: Tassa pana jānanaṁ na nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāyāti idha na gahitaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:105_0: ‘‘Atha kho bhagavā parittaṁ nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsuṁ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi ‘taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave,
anya-e0103n7:105_1: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ – yo vāyaṁ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito,
anya-e0103n7:106_1: Okāsalokopi sabbathā viditoti sambandho. Cakkavāḷanti lokadhātu.
anya-e0103n7:106_2: Sā hi nemimaṇḍalasadisena cakkavāḷapabbatena samantato parikkhittattā ‘‘cakkavāḷa’’nti vuccati.
anya-e0103n7:106_3: Catutiṁsasatāni cāti catuadhikāni tiṁsasatāni, tīṇisahassāni, cattārisatāni cāti attho .
anya-e0103n7:106_4: Aḍḍhuḍḍhānīti upaḍḍhacatutthāni, tīṇisatāni, paññāsañcāti attho. Nahutānīti dasasahassāni. Saṅkhātāti kathitā. Saṇṭhitīti heṭṭhā, uparito cāti sabbaso ṭhiti.
anya-e0103n7:107_1: Accuggato tāvadevāti tattakameva caturāsīti yojanasahassāniyeva ubbedho . Na kevalaṁ cettha ubbedhova,
anya-e0103n7:109_0: Tatoti sinerussa heṭṭhā, upari ca vuttappamāṇato.
anya-e0103n7:109_2: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – dvācattālīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva ca upari uggato yugandharapabbato,
anya-e0103n7:109_3: ekavīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva ca upari uggato īsadharo pabbatoti iminā nayena sesesupi upaḍḍhupaḍḍhapamāṇatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n7:109_5: evaṁ yāva sinerupādamūlāti heṭṭhā sinerupamāṇato upaḍḍhapamāṇopi yugandharapabbato pathaviyaṁ suppatiṭṭhito,
anya-e0103n7:109_6: evaṁ īsadharādayopīti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Vuttaṁ hetaṁ ‘‘mahāsamuddo, bhikkhave,
anya-e0103n7:109_7: anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro’’ti (udā. 45; cūḷava. 384; a. ni. 8.19).
anya-e0103n7:109_9: Te vitthārato yathākkamaṁ sineruādīnaṁ accuggatasamānaparimāṇāti vadanti. Brahāti mahanto.
anya-e0103n7:110_0: Sinerussa samantatoti parikkhipanavasena sinerussa samantato ṭhitā.
anya-e0103n7:110_1: Sineruṁ tāva parikkhipitvā ṭhito yugandharo, taṁ parikkhipitvā īsadharo.
anya-e0103n7:110_2: Evaṁ taṁ taṁ parikkhipitvā ṭhitā ‘‘sinerussa samantato’’ti vuttā.
anya-e0103n7:111_1: himavā pañca pabbatoti himavā pabbato pañca yojanānaṁ satāni ucco ubbedho.
anya-e0103n7:111_5: Tato eva satayojanavitthiṇṇā, tāvadeva ca uggatā.
anya-e0103n7:114_1: Tassa āsannabhāvena candamaṇḍalaṁ attano chāyāya vikalabhāvena upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0103n7:114_3: Asurabhavanaṁ sinerussa heṭṭhā. Avīci jambudīpassa. Jambudīpo sakaṭasaṇṭhāno. Aparagoyānaṁ ādāsasaṇṭhāno.
anya-e0103n7:114_7: Tiṇṇaṁ hi pattānaṁ aññamaññaāsannabhāvena ṭhapitānaṁ antarasadise tiṇṇaṁ tiṇṇaṁ cakkavāḷānaṁ antare ekeko lokantaranirayo.
anya-e0103n7:115_2: Bhagavā anantena buddhañāṇena avedi ‘‘ananto ākāso, ananto sattanikāyo,
anya-e0103n7:115_3: anantāni cakkavāḷānī’’ti tividhampi anantaṁ buddhañāṇaṁ paricchindati sayampi anantattā. Yāvatakaṁ hi ñeyyaṁ, tāvatakaṁ ñāṇaṁ. Yāvatakaṁ ñāṇaṁ, tāvatakaṁ ñeyyaṁ. Ñeyyapariyantikaṁ ñāṇaṁ, ñāṇapariyantikaṁ ñeyyanti.
anya-e0103n7:115_5: Anantatā cassa anantañeyyapaṭivijjhaneneva veditabbā tattha appaṭihatacārattā.
anya-e0103n7:115_6: Nanu cettha vivaṭṭādīnampi viditatā vattabbāti? Saccaṁ vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:115_7: sā pana parato abhiññākathāyaṁ āgamissatīti idha na gahitā.
anya-e0103n7:116_4: Sadevake hi loke sadisakappopi nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi, kuto sadiso. Visiṭṭhe pana kā kathā. Kassacīti kassacipi.
anya-e0103n7:116_6: visesapaccayānaṁ saddhāsativīriyapaññānañca ukkaṁsappattiyā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya anaññasādhāraṇo savāsanapaṭipakkhassa pahīnattā ukkaṁsapāramippatto satthu sīlaguṇo.
anya-e0103n7:116_7: Tena bhagavā sadevakaṁ lokaṁ aññadatthu abhibhuyya pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:117_2: Tassāpi ānubhāvato asadisattā. Tampi hi visayato, pavattito,
anya-e0103n7:117_4: Taṁ hi anaññasādhāraṇaṁ satthu vimuttiguṇaṁ ārabbha pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:117_5: pavattamānañca atakkāvacaraṁ paramagambhīraṁ saṇhasukhumaṁ savisayaṁ paṭipakkhadhammānaṁ suppahīnattā suṭṭhu pākaṭaṁ vibhūtataraṁ katvā pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:117_7: bhavaṅgaparivāsassa ca atiparittakattā lahuṁ lahuṁ pavattatīti.
anya-e0103n7:118_0: Evaṁ sīlādiguṇehi bhagavato uttaritarassa abhāvaṁ dassetvā idāni sadisassāpi abhāvaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘asamo’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:118_1: Tattha asamoti ekasmiṁ kāle natthi etassa sīlādiguṇena samā sadisāti asamo.
anya-e0103n7:118_4: Sīlādiguṇena natthi etassa paṭimāti appaṭimo. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Tattha upamāmattaṁ paṭimā, sadisūpamā paṭibhāgo,
anya-e0103n7:119_0: Na kho panāhaṁ samanupassāmīti mama samantacakkhunā hatthatale āmalakaṁ viya sabbalokaṁ passantopi tattha sadevake…pe… pajāya attanā attato sīlasampannataraṁ sampannatarasīlaṁ kañci puggalaṁ na kho pana passāmi,
anya-e0103n7:120_1: sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā rūpino vā arūpino vā saññino vā asaññino vā nevasaññināsaññino vā,
anya-e0103n7:120_2: tathāgato tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho. Ye, bhikkhave, buddhe pasannā, agge te pasannā.
anya-e0103n7:120_3: Agge kho pana pasannānaṁ aggo vipāko hotī’’ti (a. ni. 4.34; 5.32; 10.15; itivu90) –
anya-e0103n7:122_0: ‘‘Sadevake…pe… sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī,
anya-e0103n7:123_0: Evamādīni suttapadāni veditabbāni. Ādikā gāthāyoti ettha –
anya-e0103n7:124_0: ‘‘Ahaṁ hi arahā loke, ahaṁ satthā anuttaro;
anya-e0103n7:125_0: Ekomhi sammāsambuddho, sītibhūtosmi nibbuto. (mahāva. 11; ma. ni. 1.285; 2.341);
anya-e0103n7:127_0: Mutto mocayataṁ aggo, tiṇṇo tārayataṁ varo. (itivu. 112);
anya-e0103n7:133_1: Taṁ pana kāyasamādīhi yojanaṁ yathārahaṁ tadaṅgavinayādīsu patiṭṭhāpanaṁ hotīti āha ‘‘vinetīti vuttaṁ hotī’’ti. Dametuṁ yuttāti damanārahā.
anya-e0103n7:133_2: Amanussapurisāti ettha na manussāti amanussā. Taṁsadisatā ettha jotīyati,
anya-e0103n7:133_4: aññaṁ samānanti yakkhādayo ‘‘amanussā’’ti adhippetā, na ye keci manussehi aññe.
anya-e0103n7:133_5: Tathā hi tiracchānapurisānaṁ visuṁ gahaṇaṁ kataṁ, yakkhādayo eva ca niddiṭṭhā. Apalālo himavantavāsī.
anya-e0103n7:133_13: Vinītā vicitrehi vinayanūpāyehīti etasmiṁ atthe vitthāretabbaṁ yathārahaṁ saṇhādīhi upāyehi vinayassa dīpanato.
anya-e0103n7:134_1: paṭhamajjhānalābhino dutiyajjhāna’’ntiādinā tassa tassa uparūpari visesaṁ ācikkhantoti sambandho.
anya-e0103n7:134_3: ‘‘Dantepi dametiyevā’’ti idaṁ pubbe ‘‘sabbena sabbaṁ damathaṁ anupagatā purisadammā’’ti vuttāti katvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:134_4: Ye pana vippakatadammabhāvā sabbathā dametabbataṁ nātivattā,
anya-e0103n7:134_5: te satte sandhāya ‘‘dantepi dametiyevā’’ti vuttaṁ. Tepi hi purisadammā evāti, yato ne satthā dameti.
anya-e0103n7:135_0: Atthapadanti atthābhibyañjakapadaṁ, vākyanti attho. Vākyena hi atthābhibyatti, na nāmādipadamattena.
anya-e0103n7:135_1: Ekapadabhāvena ca anaññasādhāraṇo satthu purisadammasārathibhāvo dassito hoti. Tenāha ‘‘bhagavā hī’’tiādi.
anya-e0103n7:135_3: Tā hi aññamaññasambandhāpi asaṁkiṇṇabhāvena dissanti apadissantīti disā, disā viyāti vā disā.
anya-e0103n7:135_4: Asajjamānāti na sajjamānā vasībhāvappattiyā nissaṅgacārā. Dhāvanti javanavuttiyogato. Ekaṁyeva disaṁ dhāvati,
anya-e0103n7:135_6: Satthārā pana damitā purisadammā ekiriyāpatheneva aṭṭha disā dhāvanti.
anya-e0103n7:136_3: Kammakilesavasena samparetabbato sammā gantabbato samparāyo, paraloko,
anya-e0103n7:136_7: Tesu atthesu yo yo puggalo yaṁ yaṁ arahati, tadanurūpaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:136_11: Hitupadesādivasena paripāletabbo sāsitabbo so etassa atthīti satthā, satthavāho.
anya-e0103n7:136_12: So viya bhagavāti āha ‘‘satthā viyāti satthā, bhagavā satthavāho’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:137_0: Idāni tamatthaṁ niddesapāḷinayena dassetuṁ ‘‘yathā satthavāho’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:137_1: Tattha sattheti satthike jane. Kaṁ tārenti etthāti kantāro, nirudako araññappadeso.
anya-e0103n7:137_2: Ruḷhīvasena pana itaropi araññappadeso tathā vuccati.
anya-e0103n7:137_7: Atha vā uttāretīti khemantabhūmiṁ upanento tāreti.
anya-e0103n7:137_11: Sabbampetaṁ tāraṇuttāraṇādikhemaṭṭhāne ṭhapanamevāti āha ‘‘khemantabhūmiṁ sampāpetī’’ti. Satteti veneyyasatte. Mahāgahanatāya, mahānatthatāya,
anya-e0103n7:137_12: dunnittharaṇatāya ca jātiyeva kantāro jātikantāro, taṁ jātikantāraṁ.
anya-e0103n7:138_1: Devamanussā eva hi ukkaṭṭhasattā, na tiracchānādayo.
anya-e0103n7:138_4: Bhagavatoti nissakkavacanaṁ yathā ‘‘upajjhāyato ajjhetī’’ti, bhagavato santiketi vā attho.
anya-e0103n7:139_2: Sare nimittaṁ aggahesīti ‘‘dhammo eso vuccatī’’ti dhammasaññāya sare nimittaṁ gaṇhi,
anya-e0103n7:139_4: Sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsīti tassa sīse daṇḍassa ṭhapitabhāvaṁ apassanto tattha daṇḍaṁ uppīḷetvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0103n7:139_5: Maṇḍūkopi daṇḍe ṭhapitepi uppīḷitepi dhammagatena pasādena vissaramakarontova kālamakāsi.
anya-e0103n7:139_6: Devaloke nibbattasattānaṁ ayaṁ dhammatā, yā ‘‘kutohaṁ idha nibbatto,
anya-e0103n7:139_7: tattha kiṁ nu kho kammamakāsi’’nti āvajjanā.
anya-e0103n7:139_8: Tasmā attano purimabhavassa diṭṭhattā āha ‘‘are ahampi nāma idhanibbatto’’ti .
anya-e0103n7:140_1: buddhānubhāvañca paccakkhaṁ kātukāmo ‘‘ko me vandatī’’ti gāthāya pucchi.
anya-e0103n7:140_2: Tattha koti devanāgayakkhagandhabbādīsu ko, katamoti attho. Meti mama. Pādānīti pāde.
anya-e0103n7:140_4: ‘‘Yasasā’’ti iminā edisena parivārena, paricchedena ca. Jalanti vijjotamāno.
anya-e0103n7:140_7: Sabbā obhāsayaṁ disāti sabbā dasapi disā pabhāsento, cando viya,
anya-e0103n7:140_8: sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṁ ekālokaṁ karontoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:141_0: Evaṁ pana bhagavatā pucchito devaputto attānaṁ pavedento ‘‘maṇḍūkohaṁ pure āsi’’nti gāthamāha. Tattha pureti purimajātiyaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:141_2: ‘‘Udake maṇḍūko’’ti etena uddhamāyikādikassa thale maṇḍūkassa nivattanaṁ kataṁ hoti. Gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gunnaṁ ghāsesanaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:141_5: Udakacārīpi hi koci kacchapādi avārigocaropi hotīti ‘‘vārigocaro’’ti visesetvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:141_6: Tava dhammaṁ suṇantassāti brahmassarena karavīkarutamañjunā desentassa tava dhammaṁ ‘‘dhammo eso vuccatī’’ti sare nimittaggāhavasena suṇantassa. Anādare cetaṁ sāmivacanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:141_7: Avadhi vacchapālakoti vacche rakkhanto gopāladārako mama samīpaṁ āgantvā daṇḍamolubbha tiṭṭhanto mama sīse daṇḍaṁ sannirumbhitvā maṁ māresīti attho.
anya-e0103n7:142_0: Sitaṁ katvāti ‘‘tathā parittatarenāpi puññānubhāvena evaṁ ativiya uḷārā lokiyalokuttarā sampattiyo labbhantī’’ti pītisomanassajāto bhāsurataradhavalavipphurantadassanakiraṇāvalīhi bhiyyoso mattāya taṁ padesaṁ obhāsento sitaṁ katvā. Pītisomanassavasena hi so –
anya-e0103n7:144_0: Ānubhāvañca me passa, vaṇṇaṁ passa jutiñca me.
anya-e0103n7:145_0: ‘‘Ye ca te dīghamaddhānaṁ, dhammaṁ assosuṁ gotama;
anya-e0103n7:146_0: Pattā te acalaṭṭhānaṁ, yattha gantvā na socare’’ti. (vi. va. 859-860);
anya-e0103n7:148_0: 141.Yaṁ pana kiñcīti ettha yanti aniyamitavacanaṁ. Tathā kiñcīti. Panāti vacanālaṅkāramattaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:148_1: Tasmā yaṁ kiñcīti ñeyyassa anavasesapariyādānaṁ kataṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n7:148_6: Purimena vā satthu paṭivedhañāṇānubhāvo, pacchimena desanāñāṇānubhāvo.
anya-e0103n7:148_8: Sabbaso paṭipakkhehi vimuccatīti vimokkho, aggamaggo. Tassa anto aggaphalaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:148_9: tattha bhavaṁ tasmiṁ laddhe laddhabbato vimokkhantikañāṇaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:148_10: sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṁ sabbampi buddhañāṇaṁ. Evaṁ pavattoti ettha –
anya-e0103n7:149_0: ‘‘Sabbaññutāya buddho, sabbadassāvitāya buddho, anaññaneyyatāya buddho, visavitāya buddho, khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddho, nirupalepasaṅkhātena buddho, ekantavītarāgoti buddho, ekantavītadosoti buddho, ekantavītamohoti buddho, ekantanikkilesoti buddho, ekāyanamaggaṁ gatoti buddho,
anya-e0103n7:149_3: Buddhoti netaṁ nāmaṁ mātarā kataṁ, na pitarā kataṁ, na bhātarā kataṁ, na bhaginiyā kataṁ, na mittāmaccehikataṁ, na ñātisālohitehi kataṁ, na samaṇabrāhmaṇehi kataṁ, na devatāhi kataṁ.
anya-e0103n7:149_4: Vimokkhantikametaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ buddho’’ti (mahāni. 192) –
anya-e0103n7:150_1: Yasmā cettha tassā paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā bhedo natthi,
anya-e0103n7:150_2: tasmā dvīsu ekenāpi atthasiddhīti dassanatthaṁ ‘‘paṭisambhidānayo vā’’ti aniyamattho vā-saddo vutto.
anya-e0103n7:151_3: evaṁ bodhetā pajāyāti buddho hetukattuvasena, hetuattho cettha antonīto.
anya-e0103n7:152_0: Sabbaññutāya buddhoti sabbadhammabujjhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:152_1: Sabbadassāvitāya buddhoti sabbadhammānaṁ ñāṇacakkhunā diṭṭhattā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:152_2: Anaññaneyyatāya buddhoti aññena abodhanīto sayameva buddhattā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:152_3: Visavitāya buddhoti nānāguṇavisavanato padumamiva vikasanaṭṭhena buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:152_4: Khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddhoti evamādīhi chahi pariyāyehi niddakkhayavibuddho puriso viya sabbakilesaniddakkhayavibuddhattā buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n7:152_5: Ekāyanamaggaṁ gatoti buddhoti gamanatthānaṁ buddhiatthatāya buddhiatthānampi gamanatthatā labbhatīti ekāyanamaggaṁ gatattā buddhoti vuccatīti attho.
anya-e0103n7:152_6: Eko anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhoti buddhoti na parehi buddhattā buddho,
anya-e0103n7:152_7: atha kho sayameva anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhattā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:152_8: Abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddhoti buddhi buddhaṁ bodhoti anatthantaraṁ.
anya-e0103n7:152_11: Tato paraṁ buddhoti netaṁ nāmantiādi atthānugatāyaṁ paññattīti bodhanatthaṁ vuttanti evamettha imināpi kāraṇena bhagavā buddhoti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:153_1: Guṇavisiṭṭhasabbasattuttamagarugāravādhivacananti sabbehi sīlādiguṇehi visiṭṭhassa tato eva sabbasattehi uttamassa garuno gāravavasena vuttavacanamidaṁ bhagavāti.
anya-e0103n7:153_2: Tathā hi lokanātho aparimitanirupamappabhāvasīlādiguṇavisesasamaṅgitāya sabbānatthaparihārapubbaṅgamāya niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā sadevamanussāya pajāya,
anya-e0103n7:153_3: accantupakāritāya ca aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṁ sattānaṁ uttamagāravaṭṭhānanti.
anya-e0103n7:154_0: Bhagavāti vacanaṁ seṭṭhanti seṭṭhavācakaṁ vacanaṁ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato ‘‘seṭṭha’’nti vuttaṁ. Atha vā vuccatīti vacanaṁ, attho.
anya-e0103n7:154_1: Tasmā yo ‘‘bhagavā’’ti vacanena vacanīyo attho, so seṭṭhoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:154_4: garukaraṇaṁ vā sātisayaṁ arahatīti gāravayutto, gāravārahoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:155_0: Guṇavisesahetukaṁ ‘‘bhagavā’’ti idaṁ bhagavato nāmanti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṁ vitthārato vibhajitukāmo nāmaṁyeva tāva atthuddhāravasena dassento ‘‘catubbidhaṁ vā nāma’’ntiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:155_1: Tattha āvatthikanti avatthāya viditaṁ taṁ taṁ avatthaṁ upādāya paññattaṁ voharitaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:155_2: Tathā liṅgikaṁ tena tena liṅgena voharitaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:155_5: yadicchāya āgataṁ yadicchakaṁ. Paṭhamena ādi-saddena bālo, yuvā,
anya-e0103n7:155_6: vuḍḍhoti evamādiṁ saṅgaṇhāti, dutiyena muṇḍī, jaṭīti evamādiṁ, tatiyena bahussuto, dhammakathiko, jhāyīti evamādiṁ,
anya-e0103n7:155_9: ‘‘Vimokkhantika’’nti iminā idaṁ nāmaṁ ariyāya jātiyā jātakkhaṇeyeva jātanti dasseti. Yadi vimokkhantikaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:155_10: atha kasmā aññehi khīṇāsavehi asādhāraṇanti āha ‘‘saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:155_11: Buddhānañhi arahattaphalaṁ nipphajjamānaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇādīhi sabbehi buddhaguṇehi saddhiṁyeva nipphajjati.
anya-e0103n7:155_14: Atha vā sacchikā paññattīti paccakkhasiddhā paññatti. Yaṁguṇanimittā hi sā,
anya-e0103n7:155_15: te satthu paccakkhabhūtāti guṇā viya sāpi sacchikatā eva nāma hoti,
anya-e0103n7:156_3: Akāsi bhagganti rāgādipāpadhammaṁ bhaggaṁ akāsi, bhaggavāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:156_5: Subhāvitattanoti sammadeva bhāvitasabhāvassa. Paccatte cetaṁ sāmivacanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:158_0: ‘‘Bhagavāti gāravādhivacanametaṁ. Apica bhaggarāgoti bhagavā, bhaggadosoti bhagavā, bhaggamohoti bhagavā, bhaggamānoti bhagavā, bhaggadiṭṭhīti bhagavā, bhaggataṇhoti bhagavā, bhaggakilesoti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n7:158_1: bhaji vibhaji pavibhaji dhammaratananti bhagavā, bhavānaṁ antakaroti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n7:158_3: bhaji vā bhagavā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppānīti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n7:158_5: bhāgī vā bhagavā attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa adhisīlassa adhicittassa adhipaññāyāti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n7:158_6: bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ catunnaṁ appamaññānaṁ catunnaṁ arūpasamāpattīnanti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n7:158_7: bhāgī vā bhagavā aṭṭhannaṁ vimokkhānaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ abhibhāyatanānaṁ navannaṁ anupubbavihārasamāpattīnanti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n7:158_8: bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṁ saññābhāvanānaṁ dasannaṁ kasiṇasamāpattīnaṁ ānāpānassatisamādhissa asubhasamāpattiyāti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n7:158_9: bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ catunnaṁ sammappadhānānaṁ catunnaṁ iddhipādānaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ pañcannaṁ balānaṁ sattannaṁ bojjhaṅgānaṁ ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassāti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n7:158_10: bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṁ tathāgatabalānaṁ catunnaṁ vesārajjānaṁ catunnaṁ paṭisambhidānaṁ channaṁ abhiññānaṁ channaṁ buddhadhammānanti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n7:158_11: bhagavāti netaṁ nāmaṁ…pe… sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ bhagavā’’ti (mahāni. 83).
anya-e0103n7:159_0: Ettha ca ‘‘gāravādhivacana’’ntiādīni yadipi gāthāyaṁ āgatapadānukkamena na niddiṭṭhāni,
anya-e0103n7:159_1: yathārahaṁ pana tesaṁ sabbesampi niddesabhāvena veditabbāni.
anya-e0103n7:159_2: Tattha gāravādhivacananti garūnaṁ garubhāvavācakaṁ vacanaṁ. Bhajīti bhāgaso kathesi. Tenāha ‘‘vibhajī’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:159_3: Dhammaratananti maggaphalādiariyadhammaratanaṁ. Puna bhajīti sevi. Bhāgīti bhāgadheyyavā. Puna bhāgīti bhajanasīlo.
anya-e0103n7:159_6: suṇantassa ca tadatthaṁ ārabbha uppajjanakapītisomanassaṁ attharaso. Dhammaṁ ārabbha dhammaraso.
anya-e0103n7:159_7: Yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ ‘‘labhati atthavedaṁ, labhati dhammaveda’’nti (a. ni. 6.10).
anya-e0103n7:159_11: Channaṁ buddhadhammānanti cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:160_1: Yadipi ‘‘bhāgyavā’’tiādīhi padehi vuccamāno attho ‘‘bhagī bhajī’’ti niddesagāthāya saṅgahito eva,
anya-e0103n7:160_2: tathāpi padasiddhi atthavibhāgaatthayojanādisahito saṁvaṇṇanānayo tato aññākāroti vuttaṁ ‘‘ayaṁ pana aparo nayo’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:160_4: dhātuatthena niyojanañcāti imaṁ tividhaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n7:160_6: Pisodarādīnaṁ saddānaṁ ākatigaṇabhāvato vuttaṁ ‘‘pisodarādipakkhepalakkhaṇaṁ gahetvā’’ti. Pakkhipanameva lakkhaṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:160_11: itarampi vā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ pariyāyato lokuttarasukhanibbattakaṁ siyā.
anya-e0103n7:161_5: ‘‘Cīvarahetu vā bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, piṇḍapāta , senāsana, itibhavābhavahetu vā’’ti (a. ni.
anya-e0103n7:161_6: 4.9) evamāgatā cattāro taṇhuppādā. ‘‘Buddhe kaṅkhati, dhamme, saṅghe, sikkhāya,
anya-e0103n7:161_7: sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khīlajāto’’ti (dī. ni. 3.319; ma. ni. 1.185; a. ni. 5.205; 9.71; vibha.
anya-e0103n7:161_8: 941) evamāgatāni pañca cetokhīlāni. ‘‘Kāme avītarāgo hoti, kāye avītarāgo, rūpe avītarāgo,
anya-e0103n7:161_9: yāvadatthaṁ udarāvadehakaṁ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ anuyutto viharati,
anya-e0103n7:161_10: aññataraṁ devanikāyaṁ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṁ caratī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.320; ma. ni.
anya-e0103n7:161_12: Rūpābhinandanādayo pañcābhinandanā. Kodho, makkho, issā, sāṭheyyaṁ, pāpicchatā,
anya-e0103n7:161_13: sandiṭṭhiparāmāsoti imāni cha vivādamūlāni. Rūpataṇhādayo cha taṇhākāyā.
anya-e0103n7:162_1: Micchādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha micchattā. ‘‘Taṇhaṁ paṭicca pariyesanā, pariyesanaṁ paṭicca lābho, lābhaṁ paṭicca vinicchayo,
anya-e0103n7:162_5: pariggahaṁ paṭicca macchariyaṁ, macchariyaṁ paṭicca ārakkhā,
anya-e0103n7:162_6: ārakkhādhikaraṇaṁ daṇḍādānādayo’’ti (dī. ni. 2.103; 3.359) ete nava taṇhāmūlakā. Cattāro sassatavādā, cattāro ekaccasassatavādā, cattāro antānantikā, cattāro amarāvikkhepikā, dve adhiccasamuppannikā, soḷasa saññīvādā, aṭṭha asaññīvādā, aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā , satta ucchedavādā,
anya-e0103n7:162_8: Ajjhattikassa upādāya ‘‘asmī’’ti hoti, ‘‘itthasmī’’ti, ‘‘evasmī’’ti, ‘‘aññathāsmī’’ti, ‘‘bhavissa’’nti, ‘‘itthaṁ bhavissa’’nti, ‘‘evaṁ bhavissa’’nti, ‘‘aññathā bhavissa’’nti, ‘‘asasmī’’ti, ‘‘sātasmī’’ti, ‘‘siya’’nti, ‘‘itthaṁ siya’’nti, ‘‘evaṁ siya’’nti, ‘‘aññathā siya’’nti, ‘‘apāhaṁ siya’’nti, ‘‘apāhaṁ itthaṁ siya’’nti, ‘‘apāhaṁ evaṁ siya’’nti,
anya-e0103n7:162_12: 975-976) vuttanayā aṭṭhārasāti chattiṁsa, atītā chattiṁsa, anāgatā chattiṁsa,
anya-e0103n7:163_1: Tatthāyaṁ yojanā – lobhappabhedā dosappabhedā yāva aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritappabhedāti.
anya-e0103n7:163_2: Sabbāni sattānaṁ darathapariḷāhakarāni kilesānaṁ anekāni satasahassāni abhañjīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n7:163_3: Ārammaṇādivibhāgato hi pavattiākāravibhāgato ca anantappabhedā kilesāti.
anya-e0103n7:163_4: Saṅkhepatoti ettha samucchedappahānavasena sabbaso appavattikaraṇena kilesamāraṁ,
anya-e0103n7:163_7: balavidhamanavisayātikkamanavasena devaputtamaccumārañca abhañji bhagge akāsi. Parissayānanti upaddavānaṁ. Sampati,
anya-e0103n7:163_8: āyatiñca sattānaṁ anatthāvahattā māraṇaṭṭhena vibādhanaṭṭhena kilesāva māroti kilesamāro.
anya-e0103n7:163_10: Tathā hi vuttaṁ ‘‘vadhakaṁ rūpaṁ ‘vadhakaṁ rūpa’nti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānātī’’tiādi (saṁ. ni. 3.85).
anya-e0103n7:163_12: Saṁkilesanimittaṁ hutvā guṇamāraṇaṭṭhena devaputtova māroti devaputtamāro. Sattānaṁ jīvitassa,
anya-e0103n7:163_13: jīvitaparikkhārānañca jānikaraṇena mahābādharūpattā maccu eva māroti maccumāro.
anya-e0103n7:164_12: dhammakāyaṁ paññācakkhunā disvā dukkhadvayassa paṭippassambhanato upagatānañca tesaṁ āmisadānadhammadānehi upakāritā,
anya-e0103n7:164_14: tasmā tumhehipi evameva paṭipajjitabba’’nti evaṁ sammāpaṭipattiyaṁ niyojanena abhigatānaṁ lokiyalokuttarasukhehi saṁyojanasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti.
anya-e0103n7:165_2: adhiṭṭhāniddhiādiko iddhividhopi cittissariyameva cittabhāvanāya vasībhāvappattiyā ijjhanato.
anya-e0103n7:165_3: Aṇimālaghimādikanti ādi-saddena mahimā patti pākammaṁ īsitā vasitā yatthakāmāvasāyitāti ime chapi saṅgahitā.
anya-e0103n7:165_6: Mahattaṁ mahimā kāyassa mahantatāpādanaṁ. Iṭṭhadesappatti patti.
anya-e0103n7:165_8: Sayaṁvasitā issarabhāvo īsitā. Iddhividhe vasībhāvo vasitā. Ākāsena vā gacchato,
anya-e0103n7:165_9: aññaṁ vā kiñci karoto yattha katthaci vosānappatti yatthakāmāvasāyitā.
anya-e0103n7:166_3: Tattha idha adhigatasatthuguṇānaṁ āruppe uppannānaṁ ‘‘itipi so bhagavā’’tiādinā bhagavato guṇe anussarantānaṁ yaso pākaṭo hotīti āha ‘‘lokattayabyāpako’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:166_7: ‘‘Tiṇṇo tāreyya’’ntiādinā yaṁ yaṁ etena lokanāthena icchitaṁ manovacīpaṇidhānavasena,
anya-e0103n7:167_1: Paṭiccasamuppādādīhīti ādi-saddena na kevalaṁ vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṁ āgatā satipaṭṭhānādayova saṅgahitā, atha kho saṅgahādayo, samayavimuttādayo, ṭhapanādayo ,
anya-e0103n7:167_3: Dukkhasaccassa pīḷanaṭṭho taṁsamaṅgino sattassa hiṁsanaṁ avipphārikatākaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:167_5: Santāpaṭṭho dukkhadukkhatādīhi santappanaṁ paridahanaṁ. Vipariṇāmaṭṭho jarāya,
anya-e0103n7:167_8: Nidānaṭṭho ‘‘idaṁ taṁ dukkha’’nti nidadantassa viya samuṭṭhāpanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:167_11: Nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho sabbūpadhīnaṁ paṭinissaggasabhāvattā tato vinissaṭatā, tannissaraṇanimittatā vā.
anya-e0103n7:167_21: Satipi hi jhānādīnaṁ ārammaṇādhipatibhāve ‘‘jhānādhipatino dhammā’’ti evamādiṁ avatvā ‘‘maggādhipatino dhammā’’ icceva vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:167_24: Kasmā panettha aññesu rogagaṇṭhādiākāresu vijjamānesu eteva pariggayhantīti?
anya-e0103n7:168_0: Dibbavihāro kasiṇādiārammaṇāni rūpāvacarajjhānāni. Mettādijjhānāni brahmavihāro. Phalasamāpatti ariyavihāro.
anya-e0103n7:168_2: Paṭhamajjhānādinā nīvaraṇādīhi vivittacittatā cittaviveko. Upadhiviveko nibbānaṁ. Aññeti lokiyābhiññādike.
anya-e0103n7:169_2: Vantanti ariyamaggamukhena uggiritaṁ puna apaccāvamanavasena chaḍḍitaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:169_3: Bhagavāti vuccati niruttinayenāti dassento āha ‘‘yathā…pe… mekhalā’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:170_0: Aparo nayo – bhāgavāti bhagavā, bhatavāti bhagavā, bhāge vanīti bhagavā, bhage vanīti bhagavā, bhattavāti bhagavā, bhage vamīti bhagavā. Bhāge vamīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n7:171_0: Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
anya-e0103n7:172_0: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino.
anya-e0103n7:173_2: te anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā tathāgatassa atthi upalabbhanti.
anya-e0103n7:173_3: Tathā hissa sīlaṁ samādhi paññā vimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ, hirī ottappaṁ, saddhā vīriyaṁ, sati sampajaññaṁ, sīlavisuddhi diṭṭhivisuddhi, samatho vipassanā, tīṇi kusalamūlāni, tīṇi sucaritāni, tayo sammāvitakkā, tisso anavajjasaññā, tisso dhātuyo, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, cattāro ariyamaggā, cattāri ariyaphalāni, catasso paṭisambhidā, catuyoniparicchedakañāṇāni, cattāro ariyavaṁsā, cattāri vesārajjañāṇāni, pañca padhāniyaṅgāni, pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhi, pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhi, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, pañca nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, pañca vimuttāyatanañāṇāni,
anya-e0103n7:173_4: pañca vimuttiparipācanīyā saññā, cha anussatiṭṭhānāni, cha gāravā, cha nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, cha satatavihārā, cha anuttariyāni, cha nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā, cha abhiññā, cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni, satta aparihāniyā dhammā, satta ariyadhammā, satta ariyadhanāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, satta sappurisadhammā, satta nijjaravatthūni, satta saññā,
anya-e0103n7:173_6: aṭṭhapaññāpaṭilābhahetudesanā, aṭṭha sammattāni, aṭṭhalokadhammātikkamā, aṭṭha ārambhavatthūni, aṭṭhaakkhaṇadesanā, aṭṭha mahāpurisavitakkā, aṭṭhaabhibhāyatanadesanā, aṭṭha vimokkhā,
anya-e0103n7:173_8: nava pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅgāni, navasattāvāsadesanā, nava āghātapaṭivinayā, nava saññā, nava nānattā, nava anupubbavihārā, dasa nāthakāraṇā dhammā, dasa kasiṇāyatanāni, dasa kusalakammapathā, dasa sammattāni, dasa ariyavāsā, dasa asekkhadhammā, dasa tathāgatabalāni, ekādasa mettānisaṁsā, dvādasa dhammacakkākārā, terasa dhutaguṇā, cuddasa buddhañāṇāni,
anya-e0103n7:173_11: ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni, catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni , paññāsa udayabbayañāṇāni, paropaññāsa kusaladhammā, sattasattatiñāṇavatthūni,
anya-e0103n7:173_14: tathā anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantānaṁ sattānaṁ āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādayo anantāparimāṇabhedā anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā saṁvijjanti upalabbhanti.
anya-e0103n7:173_15: Tasmā yathāvuttavibhāgā guṇabhāgā assa atthīti bhāgavāti vattabbe ā-kārassa rassattaṁ katvā ‘‘bhagavā’’ti vutto. Evaṁ tāva bhāgavāti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n7:176_1: Ye te sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannehi manussattādike aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā sammāsambodhiyā katamahābhinīhārehi mahābodhisattehi paripūretabbā dānapāramī,
anya-e0103n7:176_5: saccādīni cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni, attapariccāgo, nayana, dhana, rajja,
anya-e0103n7:176_6: puttadārapariccāgoti pañca mahāpariccāgā, pubbayogo, pubbacariyā, dhammakkhānaṁ, ñātatthacariyā, lokatthacariyā,
anya-e0103n7:176_9: te mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya kappānaṁ satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyāni yathā hānabhāgiyā, saṁkilesabhāgiyā, ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na honti,
anya-e0103n7:176_11: evaṁ sakkaccaṁ nirantaraṁ anavasesato bhatā sambhatā assa atthīti bhatavāti vattabbe ‘‘bhagavā’’ti vutto niruttinayena ta-kārassa ga-kāraṁ katvā.
anya-e0103n7:176_12: Atha vā bhatavāti teyeva yathāvutte buddhakārakadhamme vuttanayena bhari sambhari, paripūresīti attho. Evampi bhatavāti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n7:178_0: Sambhāre bhatavā nātho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n7:179_3: attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṁ niccakappaṁ niccakappaṁ vani bhaji sevi bahulamakāsīti bhāge vanīti bhagavā. Atha vā abhiññeyyadhammesu, kusalādīsu,
anya-e0103n7:179_4: khandhādīsu ca ye te pariññeyyādivasena saṅkhepato vā catubbidhā abhisamayabhāgā,
anya-e0103n7:179_5: vitthārato pana ‘‘cakkhuṁ pariññeyyaṁ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṁ pariññeyya’’ntiādinā anekapariññeyyabhāgā,
anya-e0103n7:179_6: ‘‘cakkhussa samudayo pahātabbo…pe… jarāmaraṇassa samudayo pahātabbo’’tiādinā pahātabbabhāgā,
anya-e0103n7:179_7: ‘‘cakkhussa nirodho…pe… jarāmaraṇassa nirodho sacchikātabbo’’tiādinā (paṭi. ma. 1.21) sacchikātabbabhāgā,
anya-e0103n7:179_9: ‘‘cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’’tiādinā ca anekabhedā bhāvetabbabhāgā ca dhammā,
anya-e0103n7:179_10: te sabbe vani bhaji yathārahaṁ gocarabhāvanāsevanānaṁ vasena sevi. Evampi bhāge vanīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n7:179_11: Atha vā ye ime sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā sāvakehi sādhāraṇā guṇakoṭṭhāsā guṇabhāgā,
anya-e0103n7:179_12: ‘‘kinti nu kho te veneyyasantānesu patiṭṭhapeyya’’nti mahākaruṇāya vani abhipatthayi,
anya-e0103n7:179_13: sā cassa abhipatthanā yathādhippetaphalāvahā ahosi. Evampi bhāge vanīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n7:181_0: Bhaji patthayi sattānaṁ, hitāya bhagavā tato.
anya-e0103n7:182_1: Samāsato tāva katapuññehi payogasampannehi yathāvibhavaṁ bhajīyantīti bhagā, lokiyalokuttarasampattiyo.
anya-e0103n7:182_2: Tattha lokiye tāva tathāgato sambodhito pubbe bodhisattabhūto paramukkaṁsagate vani bhaji sevi,
anya-e0103n7:182_3: yattha patiṭṭhāya niravasesato buddhakārakadhamme samannānento buddhadhamme paripācesi.
anya-e0103n7:182_4: Buddhabhūto pana te niravajjasukhūpasaṁhite anaññasādhāraṇe lokuttarepi vani bhaji sevi.
anya-e0103n7:182_6: jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattiñāṇadassanamaggabhāvanāphalasacchikiriyādiuttarimanussadhammavasena ca anekavihite anaññasādhāraṇe bhage vani bhaji sevi. Evampi bhage vanīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n7:183_0: Yā tā sampattiyo loke, yā ca lokuttarā puthū;
anya-e0103n7:184_0: Sabbā tā bhaji sambuddho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n7:185_1: Bhattā daḷhabhattikā assa bahū atthīti bhattavā.
anya-e0103n7:185_2: Tathāgato hi mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiaparimitanirupamappabhāvaguṇavisesasamaṅgi bhāvato sabbasattuttamo sabbānatthaparihārapubbaṅgamāya niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā sadevamanussāya pajāya accantupakāritāya dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaasītianubyañjanabyāmappabhādianaññasādhāraṇaguṇavisesapaṭimaṇḍitarūpakāyatāya yathābhuccaguṇādhigatena ‘‘itipi so bhagavā’’tiādinayappavattena lokattayabyāpināsuvipulena,
anya-e0103n7:185_5: dasabalacatuvesārajjādiniratisayaguṇavisesasamaṅgibhāvato ca ‘‘rūpappamāṇo rūpappasanno, ghosappamāṇo ghosappasanno, lūkhappamāṇo lūkhappasanno,
anya-e0103n7:185_6: dhammappamāṇo dhammappasanno’’ti evaṁ catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse sabbathāpi pasādāvahabhāvena samantapāsādikattā aparimāṇānaṁ sattānaṁ sadevamanussānaṁ ādarabahumānagāravāyatanatāya paramapemasambhattiṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:185_7: Ye tassa ovāde patiṭṭhitā aveccappasādena samannāgatā honti,
anya-e0103n7:185_8: kenaci asaṁhāriyā tesaṁ sambhatti samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vāti.
anya-e0103n7:185_9: Tathā hi te attano jīvitapariccāgepi tattha pasādaṁ na pariccajanti,
anya-e0103n7:188_1: mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṁ nātivattati, evameva kho, bhikkhave,
anya-e0103n7:188_3: taṁ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī’’ti (udā. 45; cūḷava. 385) ca.
anya-e0103n7:189_0: Evaṁ bhattavāti bhagavā niruttinayena ekassa ta-kārassa lopaṁ katvā itarassa ga-kāraṁ katvā.
anya-e0103n7:191_0: Sambhattā bahavo satthu, bhagavā tena vuccati.
anya-e0103n7:192_1: Yasmā tathāgato bodhisattabhūtopi purimāsu jātīsu pāramiyo pūrento bhagasaṅkhātaṁ siriṁ, issariyaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:192_2: yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṁ viya anapekkho chaḍḍayi.
anya-e0103n7:192_8: 2.17.195 ādayo) evamādīsu nekkhammapāramipūraṇavasena devarajjasadisāya rajjasiriyā pariccattaattabhāvānaṁ parimāṇaṁ natthi.
anya-e0103n7:192_10: cakkavattisampattisannissayaṁ sattaratanasamujjalaṁ yasañca tiṇāyapi amaññamāno nirapekkho pahāya abhinikkhamitvā sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho,
anya-e0103n7:192_11: tasmā ime siriādike bhage vamīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n7:192_15: Tepi bhagavā vami tannivāsasattāvāsasamatikkamanato tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena pajahīti. Evampi bhage vamīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n7:195_2: te khandhāyatanadhātādivasena, tatthāpi rūpavedanādivasena, atītādivasena ca anekavidhā,
anya-e0103n7:195_3: te ca bhagavā ‘‘sabbaṁ papañcaṁ, sabbaṁ yogaṁ, sabbaṁ ganthaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:195_4: sabbaṁ saṁyojanaṁ samucchinditvā amataṁ dhātuṁ samadhigacchanto vami uggiri anapekkho chaḍḍayi na paccāvami.
anya-e0103n7:195_5: Tathā hesa sabbatthakameva pathaviṁ āpaṁ tejaṁ vāyaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:195_6: cakkhuṁ sotaṁ ghānaṁ jivhaṁ kāyaṁ manaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:195_7: rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme,
anya-e0103n7:195_15: rūpavicāraṁ…pe… dhammavicāra’’ntiādinā anupadadhammavibhāgavasenapi sabbeva dhammakoṭṭhāse anavasesato vami uggiri anapekkhapariccāgena chaḍḍayi. Vuttaṁ hetaṁ –
anya-e0103n7:196_2: taṁ tathāgato puna paccāvamissatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī’’ti (dī. ni. 2.183).
anya-e0103n7:197_1: Atha vā bhāge vamīti sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje hīnapaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena vami uggiri anapekkho pariccaji pajahi,
anya-e0103n7:197_2: paresañca tathattāya dhammaṁ desesi. Vuttampi cetaṁ –
anya-e0103n7:198_0: ‘‘Dhammāpi vo, bhikkhave, pahātabbā, pageva adhammā (ma. ni. 1.240). Kullūpamaṁ vo, bhikkhave,
anya-e0103n7:198_1: dhammaṁ desessāmi nittharaṇatthāya, no gahaṇatthāyā’’tiādi (ma. ni. 1.240).
anya-e0103n7:201_0: Kaṇhā sukkā yato vantā, tatopi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n7:203_0: ‘‘Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
anya-e0103n7:204_0: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:205_0: Ettha ca yasmā saṅkhepato attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipattivasena duvidhā buddhaguṇā,
anya-e0103n7:205_8: Tasmā tesaṁ vibhāvanavasena pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘araha’’ntiādīnaṁ padānaṁ gahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:206_0: Tattha ‘‘araha’’nti iminā padena pahānasampadāvasena bhagavato attahitasampatti vibhāvitā. ‘‘Sammāsambuddho,
anya-e0103n7:206_2: Nanu ca ‘‘lokavidū’’ti imināpi sammāsambuddhatā vibhāvīyatīti? Saccaṁ vibhāvīyati, atthi pana viseso,
anya-e0103n7:206_6: ‘‘Sugato’’ti pana iminā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato attahitasampatti,
anya-e0103n7:206_8: ‘‘Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussāna’’nti imehi padehi bhagavato parahitapaṭipatti vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n7:206_11: Evañca katvā ‘‘sammāsambuddho’’ti vatvā ‘‘buddho’’ti vacanaṁ samatthitaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n7:206_13: ‘‘Bhagavā’’ti ca imināpi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato sabbā attahitasampatti,
anya-e0103n7:207_0: Aparo nayo – hetuphalasattūpakāravasena saṅkhepato tividhā buddhaguṇā.
anya-e0103n7:207_1: Tattha ‘‘arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno lokavidū’’ti imehi padehi phalasampattivasena buddhaguṇā vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n7:207_2: ‘‘Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussāna’’nti imehi sattūpakāravasena buddhaguṇā pakāsitā.
anya-e0103n7:207_5: ‘‘Sugato bhagavā’’ti pana imehi padehi hetuphalasattūpakāravasena buddhaguṇā vibhāvitāti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:208_4: pariyuṭṭhānappattehi rāgehi sahitaṁ cittaṁ araññamiva corehi tena pariyuṭṭhitanti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:208_8: Etasmiṁ pakkhe rāgenāti rāgena hetunāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:208_12: Atha vā ujugatamevāti kammaṭṭhānassa vīthiṁ otiṇṇatāya līnuddhaccavigamanato majjhimasamathanimittapaṭipattiyā ujubhāvameva gataṁ.
anya-e0103n7:209_1: ‘‘So bhagavā itipi araha’’ntiādinā pubbe vuttappakārena buddhaguṇe anuvitakkayatoti sambandho.
anya-e0103n7:209_4: ‘‘Vitakkavicārā pavattantī’’ti etena buddhaguṇasaṅkhātaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ vitakkāhataṁ, vitakkapariyāhataṁ,
anya-e0103n7:209_6: Pīti uppajjatīti bhāvanāvasena upacārajjhānanipphādikā balavatī pīti uppajjati.
anya-e0103n7:209_8: Kāyacittadarathāti kāyacittapassaddhīnaṁ paṭipakkhabhūtā sukhumāvatthā uddhaccasahagatā kilesā.
anya-e0103n7:209_10: Anukkamena ekakkhaṇeti yadā buddhaguṇārammaṇā bhāvanā uparūpari visesaṁ āvahantī pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:209_11: tadā nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti, kilesā sannisinnāva honti,
anya-e0103n7:209_13: bhāvanāya paguṇatāya vitakkavicārā sātisayaṁ paṭukiccāva honti, balavatī pīti uppajjati,
anya-e0103n7:209_15: passaddhakāyassa samādhipadaṭṭhānaṁ sukhaṁ thirataraṁ hutvā pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:209_16: sukhena anubrūhitaṁ cittaṁ kammaṭṭhāne sammadeva samādhiyati.
anya-e0103n7:209_17: Evaṁ anukkamena pubbabhāge vitakkādayo uparūpari paṭupaṭutarabhāvena pavattitvā bhāvanāya majjhimasamathapaṭipattiyā indriyānañca ekarasabhāvena paṭutamāni hutvā ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n7:210_2: nevassa tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti…pe… sukhino cittaṁ samādhiyatī’’ti (a. ni. 6.10).
anya-e0103n7:211_0: Kasmā panettha jhānaṁ appanāpattaṁ na hotīti āha ‘‘buddhaguṇānaṁ pana gambhīratāyā’’tiādi.
anya-e0103n7:211_1: Gambhīre hi ārammaṇe gambhīre udake patitanāvā viya samathabhāvanā patiṭṭhaṁ na labhati,
anya-e0103n7:211_4: Nanu ca tajjāpaññattivasena sabhāvadhammo gayhatīti? Saccaṁ gayhati pubbabhāge,
anya-e0103n7:211_5: bhāvanāya pana vaḍḍhamānāya paññattiṁ samatikkamitvā sabhāveyeva cittaṁ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0103n7:211_6: Nanu ca sabhāvadhammepi katthaci appanā samijjhati dutiyāruppajjhānādīti? Saccaṁ samijjhati,
anya-e0103n7:211_9: Evampi yathā nānappakāresu kesādikoṭṭhāsesu manasikāraṁ pavattentassa ekasmiṁyeva koṭṭhāse appanāvasena bhāvanā avatiṭṭhati, evamidha kasmā na hotīti? Visamoyaṁ upaññāso.
anya-e0103n7:211_10: Tattha hi satipi koṭṭhāsabahubhāve ekappakāreneva bhāvanā vattati paṭikkūlākārasseva gahaṇato,
anya-e0103n7:211_12: na ayamekasmiṁyeva guṇe ṭhātuṁ sakkoti bhāvanābalena paccakkhato buddhaguṇesu upaṭṭhahantesu saddhāya balavabhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:212_3: Buddhaguṇānaṁ anussaraṇavasena bhāvanāya pavattattā sativepullaṁ. Tesaṁ paramagambhīratāya,
anya-e0103n7:212_9: bhayaṁ tumhāka no siyā’’ti (saṁ. ni. 1.249 thokaṁ visadisaṁ).
anya-e0103n7:212_10: Dukkhādhivāsanasamattho buddhānussatiyā sarīradukkhassa padumapalāse udakassa viya vinivaṭṭanato .
anya-e0103n7:212_12: Buddhabhūmiyaṁ cittaṁ namati buddhaguṇānaṁ mahantabhāvassa paccakkhato upaṭṭhānato.
anya-e0103n7:212_13: Buddhānussatibhāvanāya sabbadā buddhaguṇānaṁ citte viparivattanato vuttaṁ ‘‘sammukhā satthāraṁ passato viyā’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:212_14: Uttari appaṭivijjhantoti imāya bhāvanāya upari taṁ adhiṭṭhānaṁ katvā saccāni appaṭivijjhanto.
anya-e0103n7:213_0: Appamādanti appamajjanaṁ sakkaccaṁ anuyogaṁ. Kayirāthāti kareyya. Sumedhasoti sundarapañño .
anya-e0103n7:213_1: Evaṁ mahānubhāvāyāti vuttappakārena nīvaraṇavikkhambhanādisamatthena satthari sagāravabhāvādihetubhūtena mahatā sāmatthiyena samannāgatāya.
anya-e0103n7:215_1: sabhāvattho ca ādito vuttoyevāti taṁ anāmasitvā bhāvanāvidhānameva dassetuṁ ‘‘dhammānussatiṁ bhāvetukāmenāpī’’tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:215_2: Kasmā panettha buddhānussatiyaṁ viya ‘‘aveccappasādasamannāgatenā’’ti na vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:215_3: Nanu etā paṭipāṭiyā cha anussatiyo ariyasāvakānaṁ vasena desanaṁ āruḷhāti? Saccametaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:215_4: evaṁ santepi ‘‘parisuddhasīlādiguṇānaṁ puthujjanānampi ijjhantī’’ti dassanatthaṁ ‘‘aveccappasādasamannāgatenā’’ti idha na vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:215_6: Tathāpi pāḷiyaṁ āgatattā ca buddhānussatiniddese vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:216_2: Lokuttaradhammovāti avadhāraṇaṁ nippariyāyena sandiṭṭhikādiatthaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:216_4: Tathā hi pariyattidhammo bahussutena āgatāgamena paramena satinepakkena samannāgatena paññavatā ādikalyāṇatādivisesato sayaṁ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko.
anya-e0103n7:216_6: Lokuttaradhammepi samāne kalyāṇamittasannissayeneva sijjhanato, tathā satthusandassanepi.
anya-e0103n7:216_7: ‘‘Sandiṭṭhiyā jayatī’’ti ayaṁ panattho titthiyanimmaddane nippariyāyatova labbhati ,
anya-e0103n7:216_11: vodānadhammānaṁ paribrūhanañca uddissa pavattattā. Ayañca attho ‘‘ye kho tvaṁ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi,
anya-e0103n7:216_12: ime dhammā sarāgāya saṁvattanti no virāgāya,
anya-e0103n7:216_14: saupādānāya saṁvattanti no anupādānāya. Ekaṁsena, gotami, dhāreyyāsi ‘neso dhammo, neso vinayo,
anya-e0103n7:216_15: netaṁ satthusāsana’’’nti (cūḷava. 406; a. ni. 8.53), ‘‘dhammāpi vo, bhikkhave, pahātabbā, pageva adhammā’’ti (ma. ni.
anya-e0103n7:216_19: Tato eva vaṭṭadukkhanittharaṇatthikehi attano citte upanayanaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:216_20: cittassa vā tattha upanayanaṁ arahatīti opaneyyiko.
anya-e0103n7:216_23: Evaṁ sandiṭṭhikādipadesu pariyattidhammampi pakkhipitvā manasikāro yujjateva.
anya-e0103n7:217_2: Kiñcāpi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma paramatthato koci natthi,
anya-e0103n7:217_3: yesu pana avayavesu samudāyarūpena avekkhitesu ‘‘gāthā’’ti samaññā,
anya-e0103n7:217_4: taṁ tato bhinnaṁ viya katvā saṁsāmivohāraṁ āropetvā dassento ‘‘paṭhamena pādena ādikalyāṇā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:217_5: ‘‘Ekānusandhika’’nti idaṁ nātibahuvibhāgaṁ yathānusandhinā ekānusandhikaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:217_6: itarassa pana teneva desetabbadhammavibhāgena ādimajjhapariyosānabhāgā labbhantīti.
anya-e0103n7:218_0: Ayaṁ kathā visesato suttapiṭakasaṁvaṇṇanāti katvā suttapiṭakavasena dhammassa ādikalyāṇādikaṁ dassetvā idāni suttapiṭakavinayapiṭakānaṁ vasena taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘sanidānasauppattikattā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:218_1: Tattha sanidānasauppattikattāti yathāvuttanidānena sanidānatāya, saaṭṭhuppattikatāya ca.
anya-e0103n7:218_3: dhammadesanāya ca taṁtaṁsikkhāpadabhāvena paññāpiyamānassa veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṁ pavattiyamānassa anurūpato.
anya-e0103n7:218_4: Atthassāti desiyamānassa ca sīlādiatthassa. ‘‘Taṁ kissa hetu (saṁ. ni. 1.249)? Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave’’tiādinā (saṁ. ni.
anya-e0103n7:219_0: Evaṁ suttavinayavasena pariyattidhammassa ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇataṁ dassetvā idāni tīṇi piṭakāni ekajjhaṁ gahetvā taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘sakalopī’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha sāsanadhammoti –
anya-e0103n7:221_0: Sacittapariyodapanaṁ, etaṁ buddhāna sāsana’’nti. (dha. pa. 183; dī. ni. 2.90) –
anya-e0103n7:222_4: Sāsane sammāpaṭipatti nāma paññāya hoti, tassā ca sīlaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:222_6: Paññā pana anubodhapaṭivedhavasena duvidhāti tadubhayampi gaṇhanto ‘‘vipassanāmaggehi majjhekalyāṇo’’ti āha. Tassa nipphatti phalaṁ, kiccaṁ nibbānasacchikiriyā,
anya-e0103n7:222_7: tato paraṁ kattabbaṁ natthīti dassento āha ‘‘phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo’’ti.
anya-e0103n7:223_5: Satthārā yathānusiṭṭhaṁ tathā paṭipatti saṅghasuppaṭipatti, tāya pariyosānakalyāṇo,
anya-e0103n7:223_6: tāya sāsanassa loke suppatiṭṭhitabhāvato. Tanti sāsanadhammaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:223_7: Tathattāyāti yathattāya bhagavatā dhammo desito, tathattāya tathabhāvāya.
anya-e0103n7:223_8: So pana abhisambodhi paccekabodhi sāvakabodhīti tividho ,
anya-e0103n7:223_13: tadosānatāya ca sāsanadhammassa tatiyāya pariyosānakalyāṇatā vuttā.
anya-e0103n7:224_1: Nīvaraṇavikkhambhanatoti vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā saddhammaṁ suṇantassa nīvaraṇānaṁ vikkhambhanasambhavato. Vuttaṁ hetaṁ –
anya-e0103n7:225_3: tathā tathā so tattha labhati atthavedaṁ labhati dhammaveda’’nti (a. ni. 5.26).
anya-e0103n7:226_2: pañcassa nīvaraṇāni tasmiṁ samaye pahīnāni hontī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 5.219) –
anya-e0103n7:227_1: Samathavipassanāsukhāvahanatoti samathasukhassa ca vipassanāsukhassa ca sampādanato. Vuttampi cetaṁ –
anya-e0103n7:228_0: ‘‘So vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukha’’ntiādi (dī. ni. 1.279; ma. ni. 2.138).
anya-e0103n7:233_1: yathā vā satthārā anusiṭṭhaṁ, tathā paṭipanno sāsanadhammo.
anya-e0103n7:233_2: Tādibhāvāvahanatoti chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvassa lokadhammehi anupalepassa āvahanato.
anya-e0103n7:233_3: Esa bhagavā vuttanayena tividhakalyāṇaṁ dhammaṁ desento yaṁ sāsanabrahmacariyaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:234_5: Yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ ‘‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīya’’nti (mahāva. 23; saṁ. ni. 5.186). Yathānurūpanti yathārahaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:234_12: atthasabhāvaṁ sabyañjana’’nti vibhajitvā vadanti, taṁ na sundaraṁ,
anya-e0103n7:234_14: Saddatthā hi abhinnarūpā viya hutvā viniyogaṁ gacchanti.
anya-e0103n7:234_16: Satipi vā bhede ‘‘sabyañjana’’nti ettha yadi tulyayogo adhippeto ‘‘saputto āgato’’tiādīsu viya, evaṁ sati ‘‘atthapaṭisaraṇā, bhikkhave, hotha,
anya-e0103n7:234_18: atha vijjamānatāmattaṁ ‘‘salomako sapakkhako’’tiādīsu viya byañjanasampatti aggahitā siyā.
anya-e0103n7:235_0: Sātthaṁ sabyañjananti ettha nettinayenāpi atthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘saṅkāsana…pe… sabyañjana’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:235_1: Tattha yadipi nettiyaṁ byañjanamukhena byañjanatthaggahaṇaṁ hotīti ‘‘akkharaṁ pada’’ntiādinā (netti.
anya-e0103n7:235_3: idha pana pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘sātthaṁ sabyañjana’’nti āgatattā atthapadāniyeva paṭhamaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘saṅkāsanapakāsanā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:235_4: Tattha saṅkhepato kāsanaṁ dīpanaṁ saṅkāsanaṁ ‘‘maññamāno bhikkhu baddho mārassa,
anya-e0103n7:235_8: Ādikammasmiṁ hi ayaṁ pasaddo ‘‘paññapeti paṭṭhapetī’’tiādīsu (saṁ. ni. 2.20) viya.
anya-e0103n7:235_10: Tikkhindriyo hi saṅkhepato paṭhamañca vuttamatthaṁ paṭipajjati .
anya-e0103n7:235_13: Yathā ‘‘kusalā dhammā’’ti saṅkhepato sakiṁyeva ca vuttassa atthassa ‘‘katame dhammā kusalā?
anya-e0103n7:235_14: Yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ citta’’ntiādinā (dha. sa.
anya-e0103n7:235_19: vibhattassa ca pakārehi ñāpanaṁ veneyyānaṁ cittaparitosanaṁ uttānīkaraṇapaññāpanāni.
anya-e0103n7:235_22: Yo tasmiṁ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā’’tiādinā (dha. sa. 2) uttānīkiriyā, paññāpanā ca.
anya-e0103n7:236_1: Vuccate – nettipāḷiyaṁ āgatanayena purimapāṭho. Tattha hi –
anya-e0103n7:241_1: Pacchimo pana ‘‘paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti ‘passathā’ti cāhā’’ti (saṁ. ni.
anya-e0103n7:241_3: Evañca nesaṁ dvinnaṁ pāṭhānaṁ viseso, na atthato.
anya-e0103n7:241_5: paṭhamameva ṭhapanaṁ paṭṭhapana’’nti imāni padāni saṅkāsanapakāsanapadehi atthato avisiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0103n7:241_6: Yañca purimapāṭhe chaṭṭhaṁ padaṁ ‘‘pakārato ñāpana’’nti paññāpanaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:241_7: taṁ dutiyapāṭhe pakāsanapadena ‘‘nibbisesaṁ pakārato kāsana’’nti katvā.
anya-e0103n7:241_10: buddhiyā ca nisānaṁ yāthāvato vatthusabhāvāvabhāsane jāyatīti.
